tv.generator-info-name: XMLTV Merge by Ray Wilson for Renegades TV

programme.title: False Positive
programme.desc: After months of trying and failing to get pregnant, Lucy and Adrian finally find their dream fertility doctor in the illustrious Dr Hindle. But after becoming pregnant with a healthy baby girl, Lucy begins to notice something sinister through Hindle's gleaming charm, and she sets out to uncover the unsettling truth about him. Horror, starring Ilana Glazer, Justin Theroux and Pierce Brosnan.

programme.title: Paul Dood's Deadly Lunch Break
programme.desc: A weedy charity-shop worker is hoping to win a national talent show. But when the actions of five selfish people cause him to miss his audition, he sets out to take deathly revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Tom Meeten, Katherine Parkinson and Kris Marshall.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A dinner party in a country house sees four friends come together for a birthday celebration. But as the night progresses, secrets emerge and unsettling events begin to unfold around them. As manners give way to madness, an idyllic evening of celebration descends into a dark night of terror - and the group's civilised dinner party turns out to be anything but. Thriller, starring Iwan Rheon, Catalina Sandino Moreno and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: False Positive
programme.desc: After months of trying and failing to get pregnant, Lucy and Adrian finally find their dream fertility doctor in the illustrious Dr Hindle. But after becoming pregnant with a healthy baby girl, Lucy begins to notice something sinister through Hindle's gleaming charm, and she sets out to uncover the unsettling truth about him. Horror, starring Ilana Glazer, Justin Theroux and Pierce Brosnan.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: After moving to a sleepy little town, young Lucky Prescott befriends a wild mustang named Spirit, who shares her rebellious nature. When a heartless wrangler plans to capture Spirit and his herd, Lucky and her new friends embark on the adventure of a lifetime to rescue the horse that changed her life. Animation, with the voice of Isabela Merced.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A dinner party in a country house sees four friends come together for a birthday celebration. But as the night progresses, secrets emerge and unsettling events begin to unfold around them. As manners give way to madness, an idyllic evening of celebration descends into a dark night of terror - and the group's civilised dinner party turns out to be anything but. Thriller, starring Iwan Rheon, Catalina Sandino Moreno and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: VenomLet There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams.

programme.title: Stillwater\n
programme.desc: Unemployed Bill Baker travels from his home in Stillwater, Oklahoma to Marseille, France to visit his estranged daughter Allison, who was imprisoned five years earlier for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with an insurmountable language barrier, cross-cultural differences and maddening legal complexity, Baker decides to take matters into his own hands to exonerate his only child after failing to get Allison's case re-opened. Crime thriller, starring Matt Damon and Abigail Breslin.

programme.title: Moonshot
programme.desc: A laid-back barista named Walt sneaks on board a space shuttle to a colonised Mars. He teams up with Sophie, a no-nonsense college student going to Mars to see her boyfriend, to make it onto the Red Planet without getting caught. Romantic sci-fi comedy, starring Lana Condor, Cole Sprouse and Zach Braff.

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern home town and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a Congressional ally, she inspires historic legislation that allows opportunities and protections never before afforded to women. Historical romance, starring Kelsey Grammer, Anna Friel and Sean Astin.

programme.title: The Boss Baby 2
programme.desc: The Templeton brothers have become adults and drifted away from each other, but a new Boss Baby with a cutting-edge approach is about to bring them together again - and inspire a new family business. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Alec Baldwin, James Marsden and Ariana Greenblatt.

programme.title: DunePart One
programme.desc: A gifted young man, born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence - a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential - only those who can conquer their fear will survive. Denis Villeneuve's sci-fi drama, starring Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: PAW Patrolthe Movie
programme.desc: When the crew's biggest rival, Mayor Humdinger, becomes Mayor of nearby Adventure City and starts wreaking havoc, Ryder and the heroic pups kick into high gear to face the challenge head-on. While one of the pups must face his past in Adventure City, the team finds help from a new ally, the savvy dachshund Liberty. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lewis Crabb-LaHei, Matthew Campbell and Alfie Elliott.

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc: Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high-school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression, and inspires a broken nation along the way. Sporting drama, starring Luke Wilson, Vinessa Shaw, Wayne Knight and Martin Sheen.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Art and life collide as John Kaplan, a courier carrying Andy Warhol's famous `Pink Marilyn", arrives in New York City. Kaplan attempts to juggle the Mob and his talent as an art forger with his complicated love life. Crime drama, starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emile Hirsch, Paz Vega and Jeremy Piven.

Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams.

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern home town and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a Congressional ally, she inspires historic legislation that allows opportunities and protections never before afforded to women. Historical romance, starring Kelsey Grammer, Anna Friel and Sean Astin.

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: Five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy, and live the life they have always wanted, is to steal from some of Chicago's richest people and give to themselves. Director Seth Savoy's crime drama, based on a true story and starring Michael Shannon, Patrick Schwarzenegger and Alex Pettyfer.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: Korean immigrant Jacob Yi uproots his family from their home in California to Arkansas, hoping to start afresh and capture the elusive American Dream, starting a 50-acre farm to grow and sell Korean fruits and vegetables. Romantic drama set in the 1980s, starring Steven Yeun and Yeri Han.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure based on the 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, and featuring Bill Murray. When a top computer boffin is kidnapped, crime-busting trio Natalie, Dylan and Alex become involved in a game of betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Charlie's AngelsFull Throttle
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure sequel based on the popular 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu. When the special agents investigate a series of deaths connected to the Federal Witness Protection Programme, they discover evidence that points to "fallen" Angel Madison Lee.

programme.title: The Little Things
programme.desc: Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe `Deke" Deacon reluctantly returns to his old stomping ground in Los Angeles for what should be a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorising the city. Crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Rami Malek and Jared Leto.

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Years after an unspeakable tragedy tore their lives apart, two sets of grieving parents agree to talk privately about what happened, in an attempt to move forward. First-time director Fran Kranz' drama, starring Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Reed Birney and Ann Dowd.

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: Comedy starring Cameron Diaz and Jason Segel. After ten years of marriage Annie and Jay decide to spice up their love life by committing a marathon three hour session between the sheets to tape. But when the recording goes missing they're forced into a frantic search to recover it and save their reputations.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal Agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve O'Reilly.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Spy action thriller based on the novel by Robert Ludlum, starring Matt Damon and Franka Potente. Jason Bourne is rescued from the Mediterranean with bullet wounds in his back and suffering from amnesia. When he regains consciousness, he discovers that the only clue to his identity is a laser device under his skin, which reveals the name of a Zurich bank and the numbers of a Swiss bank account.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Denzel Washington and Pedro Pascal. Now living a peaceful life, former Marine and government agent Robert McCall offers his singular skills pro bono to those in need. However, when his friend is killed under suspicious circumstances, McCall investigates, and uses any means necessary to see justice served.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: MMA fighter Cole Young embarks on a quest to seek out Earth's greatest champions, in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe. Fantasy action adventure based on the video game series, starring Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson and Joe Taslim.

programme.title: The Joneses
programme.desc: Satirical comedy drama starring David Duchovny and Demi Moore. Seemingly perfect couple Kate and Steve Jones are the envy of their new suburban neighbours with their glamorous lifestyle and endless supply of designer goods. But behind the glossy facade Kate and Steve hold a dark secret.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Action comedy adventure based on the 1970s TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu, and featuring Bill Murray. When a top computer boffin is kidnapped, crime-busting trio Natalie, Dylan and Alex become involved in a game of betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Samuel L Jackson. Businessman Ken Carter is recruited to improve the fortunes of a failing high-school basketball team. His exacting standards soon put the players under extreme pressure - both on the court and in the classroom.

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Zac Efron and Imogen Poots. Jason and his buddies make the most of the New York dating scene. But when the girl of Jason's dreams wants him to show a bit more commitment, he must think again about his fancy-free lifestyle.

programme.title: Knowing
programme.desc: Disaster thriller starring Nicolas Cage and Rose Byrne. When the opening of a time capsule at his son's school reveals a sheet of apparently random numbers, John Koestler soon realises the list is an encoded prediction of every global disaster of the past 50 years - plus three catastrophes that are yet to occur. Can he convince anyone else of the importance of his discovery before it's too late?

programme.title: Bandslam
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Gaelan Alexander Connell and Vanessa Hudgens. New kid in town, Will, forms some unlikely friendships brought about by a shared love of music. However, clashing personalities and revelations from Will's past threaten to derail their attempts to win a Battle of the Bands competition.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Spy action thriller based on the novel by Robert Ludlum, starring Matt Damon and Franka Potente. Jason Bourne is rescued from the Mediterranean with bullet wounds in his back and suffering from amnesia. When he regains consciousness, he discovers that the only clue to his identity is a laser device under his skin, which reveals the name of a Zurich bank and the numbers of a Swiss bank account.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: MMA fighter Cole Young embarks on a quest to seek out Earth's greatest champions, in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe. Fantasy action adventure based on the video game series, starring Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson and Joe Taslim.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Denzel Washington and Pedro Pascal. Now living a peaceful life, former Marine and government agent Robert McCall offers his singular skills pro bono to those in need. However, when his friend is killed under suspicious circumstances, McCall investigates, and uses any means necessary to see justice served.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Spy action thriller, the first sequel to The Bourne Identity, starring Matt Damon. Ex-CIA agent Jason Bourne, still suffering memory loss following an accident, finds his life in danger when he is implicated in the killing of an agent in Berlin.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller starring Tom Cruise. When five innocent people are gunned down in Pittsburgh, all evidence points to former US Army sniper James Barr. However, Barr refuses to confess to the crime, and sends out word for ex-military investigator Jack Reacher to clear his name. Despite being no friend of Barr's, Reacher looks into the murders and discovers the victims may not have been so randomly selected after all.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Supernatural horror thriller starring Devon Sawa and Ali Larter. Shortly before take off on a flight to France, student Alex Browning is so overcome by powerful visions of a midair explosion that he and his party are ejected from the plane. When Alex's dreadful premonition comes true it appears that the group have cheated death - but the terrifying forces at work are not going to be denied.

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: David Ghantt, a guard at an armoured car company in southern USA, organises one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Jared Hess's crime comedy based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery, starring Zach Galifianakis, Kristen Wiig and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Zac Efron and Imogen Poots. Jason and his buddies make the most of the New York dating scene. But when the girl of Jason's dreams wants him to show a bit more commitment, he must think again about his fancy-free lifestyle.

programme.title: Knowing
programme.desc: Disaster thriller starring Nicolas Cage and Rose Byrne. When the opening of a time capsule at his son's school reveals a sheet of apparently random numbers, John Koestler soon realises the list is an encoded prediction of every global disaster of the past 50 years - plus three catastrophes that are yet to occur. Can he convince anyone else of the importance of his discovery before it's too late?

programme.title: The Climb
programme.desc: Comedy drama following the tumultuous yet enduring relationship between best friends Kyle and Mike, spanning many years of laughter, heartbreak and rage. Directed by and starring Michael Angelo Covino, with Kyle Marvin, Gayle Rankin, Talia Balsam and George Wendt.

programme.title: The Delivery Man
programme.desc: A man who made regular donations to a sperm bank 20 years ago discovers he has fathered more than 500 children. He is touched by an encounter with one of his sons, and decides to track down as many of his offspring as possible and help them with their lives. US remake of French comedy drama Starbuck, starring Vince Vaughn, Chris Pratt and Cobie Smulders.

programme.title: Clemency
programme.desc: American prison warden Bernadine Williams has presided over a dozen executions. However, as the 13th looms, she grapples with complex emotions while bonding with a death-row inmate who maintains his innocence. Writer/director Chinonye Chukwu's drama, starring Alfre Woodard, Richard Schiff, Danielle Brooks and Michael O'Neill.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Spy action thriller, the first sequel to The Bourne Identity, starring Matt Damon. Ex-CIA agent Jason Bourne, still suffering memory loss following an accident, finds his life in danger when he is implicated in the killing of an agent in Berlin.

programme.title: Masterminds
programme.desc: David Ghantt, a guard at an armoured car company in southern USA, organises one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Jared Hess's crime comedy based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery, starring Zach Galifianakis, Kristen Wiig and Owen Wilson.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller starring Tom Cruise. When five innocent people are gunned down in Pittsburgh, all evidence points to former US Army sniper James Barr. However, Barr refuses to confess to the crime, and sends out word for ex-military investigator Jack Reacher to clear his name. Despite being no friend of Barr's, Reacher looks into the murders and discovers the victims may not have been so randomly selected after all.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Spy action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Julia Stiles and Joan Allen. When an article about a covert CIA operation appears in The Guardian, trained assassin Jason Bourne sets off for London to meet the journalist behind the exposé who may be able to shed light on Bourne's past. But his former employers are also on the trail with instructions to make sure that the meeting never happens.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: Romantic comedy drama starring Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst. When lonely Joel and free-spirited Clementine meet on a beach they instantly fall for one another. But it soon transpires they have already had a relationship, all memories of which have been wiped from their minds by a mysterious company called Lacuna Inc.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Seth Rogen and Katherine Heigl. Alison Scott's career as a television journalist is going from strength to strength. Out on the town to celebrate a promotion, she ends up in bed with amiable slacker Ben Stone and their one-night stand results in an unexpected pregnancy that turns Alison's world upside down.

programme.title: Creation Stories
programme.desc: The story of Creation Records co-founder Alan McGee, who managed and championed acts including Oasis, Primal Scream, the Jesus and Mary Chain and the Libertines. Director Nick Moran's biopic stars Ewen Bremner as McGee, alongside Kirsty Mitchell, Thomas Turgoose, Suki Waterhouse and Leo Flanagan.

programme.title: Clemency
programme.desc: American prison warden Bernadine Williams has presided over a dozen executions. However, as the 13th looms, she grapples with complex emotions while bonding with a death-row inmate who maintains his innocence. Writer/director Chinonye Chukwu's drama, starring Alfre Woodard, Richard Schiff, Danielle Brooks and Michael O'Neill.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films for May 2022.

programme.title: Words on Bathroom Walls
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate, who inspires him to not be defined by his condition. Romantic drama, starring Charlie Plummer, Andy Garcia and Taylor Russell.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. A group of teenage delinquents in a detention centre are given a chance to redeem themselves when their frustrated probation officer decides to turn them into a football team.

programme.title: Blumhouse's The CraftLegacy
programme.desc: Three girls, Frankie, Tabby, and Lourdes, attempt to freeze time with magic, but they require a fourth member. When Lily Schechner moves into the town with her therapist mother, the newcomer's special powers make her perfect for their coven. Sequel to 1996 horror drama The Craft, starring Cailee Spaeny, Gideon Adlon, Lovie Simone and Zoey Luna.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Sports drama based on a true story, starring Steve Carell, Channing Tatum and Mark Ruffalo. Olympic gold medal-winning wrestlers Mark and Dave Schultz are invited by wealthy philanthropist and fan John du Pont to come and live on his estate and train a team for the 1988 Seoul Olympics. Mark accepts the offer, but du Pont's benevolence hides an obsession that will have ramifications for both brothers.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day. M Night Shyamalan's horror, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Vicky Krieps and Rufus Sewell.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: A quiet and unassuming family man slowly reveals his true character after his house is burgled by two petty thieves. The aftermath of the incident ignites his long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that brings to the surface dark secrets and lethal skills. Crime drama, starring Bob Odenkirk, Connie Nielsen and Aleksey Serebryakov.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. An ex-hitman embarks on a bloody trail of revenge when some hoodlums kill his dog.

programme.title: Blumhouse's The CraftLegacy

programme.desc: Upcoming films for May 2022.

programme.title: The Glorias
programme.desc: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organiser for women's rights worldwide. Director Julie Taymor's biopic, starring Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Ryan Kiera Armstrong and Lulu Wilson, who all portray Steinem at different points in her life. With Janelle Monae and Bette Midler.

programme.title: School's Out Forever
programme.desc: No sooner has 15-year-old Lee Keegan been expelled from his private school than a pandemic spreads like wildfire around the globe. With his father dead and mother trapped abroad, Lee is given one instruction - go back to school. But safety and security at St Mark's School for Boys is in short supply. Horror comedy, starring Oscar Kennedy, Anthony Head and Samantha Bond.

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer and Hugh Grant, based on the popular 1960s TV series. With the discovery that a criminal mastermind has a nuclear capability, CIA operative Napoleon Solo and KGB agent Illya Kuryakin are teamed up to thwart the threat. But first the pair must put their differences aside.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Keanu Reeves. An ex-hitman embarks on a bloody trail of revenge when some hoodlums kill his dog.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: A quiet and unassuming family man slowly reveals his true character after his house is burgled by two petty thieves. The aftermath of the incident ignites his long-simmering rage, triggering dormant instincts and propelling him on a brutal path that brings to the surface dark secrets and lethal skills. Crime drama, starring Bob Odenkirk, Connie Nielsen and Aleksey Serebryakov.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day. M Night Shyamalan's horror, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Vicky Krieps and Rufus Sewell.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Adventure drama starring Tom Hanks and Helen Hunt. Workaholic executive Chuck Noland is looking forward to spending Christmas with his girlfriend, but is sent abroad on an assignment at the last minute. When his plane crashes into the Pacific, Chuck is stranded alone on a remote, uninhabited island.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Music drama starring Miles Teller and J K Simmons. Aspiring jazz drummer Andrew wins a place at a prestigious music conservatory and quickly advances to the school's studio band. But the educational approach of instructor Terence Fletcher consists of intimidating and threatening his students. With Andrew determined to succeed, and Fletcher obsessed with musical perfection, an unpredictable battle of wills unfolds.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Maggie Grace and Toby Kebbell. With a category 5 hurricane bearing down on an Alabama town, an opportunistic group of crooks use the meteorological mayhem as cover for an audacious raid on a US Treasury facility. However, standing in the criminals' way are a maverick ATF agent and a stormchaser with a tragic past.

programme.title: Once upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Epic spaghetti western starring Henry Fonda, Claudia Cardinale, Jason Robards and Charles Bronson. A cold-blooded killer is hired to ensure the progress of the railroad through a nascent frontier town. Standing in its way is recently widowed Jill McBain, whose property has a water supply that is vital for the venture.

programme.title: The Big Heat
programme.desc: Film noir starring Glenn Ford, Gloria Grahame and Lee Marvin. When tough detective Dave Bannion is assigned to investigate a colleague's suicide, he is sceptical about the reasons given for his death. Forced to work under cover, he discovers the existence of a suicide note that implicates a brutal Mob boss.

programme.title: Dragonthe Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Biographical drama, adapted from the book by Bruce Lee's wife, Linda Lee Cadwell, starring Jason Scott Lee as the martial arts star who died in 1973 at the age of 32. The film charts Lee's rise to fame on the big and small screens, his invention of a new martial arts style and his battle against racial discrimination in Hollywood.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. Slow-witted Forrest Gump is encouraged by his mother to realise his full potential. He attends college on a sports scholarship, meeting President Kennedy in the process, joins the army and is sent to Vietnam. As the years pass and his life changes, he maintains contact with his childhood friend Jenny Curran.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Courtroom drama starring Tom Cruise, Jack Nicholson and Demi Moore. Navy lawyer Daniel Kaffee is assigned to defend two marines accused of killing a colleague at their base in Cuba. As he gathers evidence for the case, Kaffee encounters strong opposition from the base's disciplinarian commanding officer.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Ewan McGregor and Naomi Watts. The holiday of a lifetime in Thailand turns into a nightmare for a family separated by the deadly 2004 Boxing Day tsunami. With the area a devastated wasteland, the struggle begins to find out who has survived.

programme.title: Airplane!
programme.desc: Disaster-movie spoof starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty and Leslie Nielsen. An eccentric collection of passengers and crew sets off from Los Angeles on a flight bound for Chicago. However, disaster looms when the pilots are struck down with food poisoning and former fighter pilot Ted Striker, trying to win back the love of stewardess Elaine, must face his fear of flying to land the plane.

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Oscar-winning romantic drama starring Ali MacGraw and Ryan O'Neal. Jenny and Oliver are students in Boston: she's a struggling musician and he's an aspiring lawyer from a wealthy family. They fall in love and marry, much to the fury of Oliver's father who cuts them off financially, though this does not affect their happiness. But fate has a shock in store.

programme.title: Dragonthe Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Biographical drama, adapted from the book by Bruce Lee's wife, Linda Lee Cadwell, starring Jason Scott Lee as the martial arts star who died in 1973 at the age of 32. The film charts Lee's rise to fame on the big and small screens, his invention of a new martial arts style and his battle against racial discrimination in Hollywood.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Fantasy based on the classic children's book by Roald Dahl, starring Gene Wilder. Most children, at one hungry time or another, dream of visiting a chocolate factory. For young Charlie Bucket the fantasy comes true when he finds a golden ticket in a candy bar: an invitation to tour the giant factory of eccentric sweet tycoon Willy Wonka.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
programme.desc: Classic western starring Burt Lancaster and Kirk Douglas. US Marshal Wyatt Earp tries to keep the peace in the lawless West of the 1870s. His chief adversary is the Clanton gang, but he also finds himself up against Doc Holliday, a dentist turned gambler, with a dim regard for the law. Doc's attitude changes when Earp rescues him from a mob, and the two join forces against the Clantons. After chasing the gang from Dodge City to Tombstone, both sides face each other in the legendary gunfight at the OK Corral.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand and Kate Hudson. Despite warnings from his overprotective mother and a veteran rock journalist, a dream commission from Rolling Stone magazine to accompany a rock band on tour proves to be a life-changing experience for 15-year-old aspiring writer William Miller.

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: Comedy starring Ted Ray and Kenneth Connor. When a Ministry of Education inspector visits Maudlin Street School, the pupils make sure they are on their best misbehaviour so that their headmaster, who has applied for a new job, never leaves them.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. Slow-witted Forrest Gump is encouraged by his mother to realise his full potential. He attends college on a sports scholarship, meeting President Kennedy in the process, joins the army and is sent to Vietnam. As the years pass and his life changes, he maintains contact with his childhood friend Jenny Curran.

programme.title: Airplane!
programme.desc: Disaster-movie spoof starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty and Leslie Nielsen. An eccentric collection of passengers and crew sets off from Los Angeles on a flight bound for Chicago. However, disaster looms when the pilots are struck down with food poisoning and former fighter pilot Ted Striker, trying to win back the love of stewardess Elaine, must face his fear of flying to land the plane.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Musical based on the hit stage show, starring John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John. Unexpectedly reunited with summer love Danny at her new high school, Sandy Olsson can't believe how different he is. Can the new Danny Zuko, the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-birds, really be the boy she met down at the beach? Perhaps Frenchy and Rizzo, both members of the super-cool Pink Ladies gang, can help her develop some street cred to win back his heart.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Russell Crowe. Maths genius John Forbes Nash Jr battles paranoid schizophrenia, suffering delusions that threaten to derail his academic career and his marriage, before eventually having the opportunity to win an economics Nobel Prize.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Blockbuster action drama starring Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis and Val Kilmer. Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is a rebellious pilot who is accepted into the air combat training programme at Miramar Naval Air Station. There he finds romance with one of his instructors as he battles to be the best.

programme.title: St Elmo's Fire
programme.desc: Drama starring Emilio Estevez, Rob Lowe and Demi Moore. Seven close friends who spent their college years together experience difficulties coming to terms with the realities of adulthood.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand and Kate Hudson. Despite warnings from his overprotective mother and a veteran rock journalist, a dream commission from Rolling Stone magazine to accompany a rock band on tour proves to be a life-changing experience for 15-year-old aspiring writer William Miller.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Fantasy based on the classic children's book by Roald Dahl, starring Gene Wilder. Most children, at one hungry time or another, dream of visiting a chocolate factory. For young Charlie Bucket the fantasy comes true when he finds a golden ticket in a candy bar: an invitation to tour the giant factory of eccentric sweet tycoon Willy Wonka.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral

Doc's attitude changes when Earp rescues him from a mob, and the two join forces against the Clantons. After chasing the gang from Dodge City to Tombstone, both sides face each other in the legendary gunfight at the OK Corral.

programme.title: On the Waterfront
programme.desc: Classic, Oscar-winning crime drama starring Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Lee J Cobb and Rod Steiger. One-time boxing hopeful Terry Malloy idles his time away on New York's dockside, protected by his brother Charley while "working" as a strong-arm man for the corrupt leader of the dockers' union. But Terry begins to question his loyalties after a neighbour is murdered and he falls in love with the dead man's sister, Edie.

programme.title: 2001a Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Keir Dullea stars in Stanley Kubrick's ground-breaking science-fiction epic, which depicts the evolution of man - from primitive apes to the 21st century - through the medium of space travel.

programme.title: The Guns Of Navarone
programme.desc: Classic Second World War adventure, based on Alistair MacLean's bestseller, starring Gregory Peck, David Niven and Anthony Quinn. Buried deep in the solid rock of a cliff and impregnable to assault by plane or ship, the German guns on the Greek island of Navarone must be destroyed if the lives of two thousand British soldiers are to be saved. A crack team of commandos is assembled for this perilous mission, each with a special and deadly talent.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Russell Crowe. Maths genius John Forbes Nash Jr battles paranoid schizophrenia, suffering delusions that threaten to derail his academic career and his marriage, before eventually having the opportunity to win an economics Nobel Prize.

programme.title: Top Gun

Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is a rebellious pilot who is accepted into the air combat training programme at Miramar Naval Air Station. There he finds romance with one of his instructors as he battles to be the best.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Science-fiction drama starring Richard Dreyfuss. While investigating an extensive power failure in Indiana, Roy Neary encounters a UFO - a phenomenon also witnessed by Jillian Guiler and her young son. When he is unable to convince anyone of his sighting, Neary's strange behaviour starts to worry his family.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. Soon she discovers that a power company has been dumping toxic waste and poisoning the residents of a small town. Masry's firm takes up the case - making Brockovich the unlikely linchpin in one of corporate America's biggest ever lawsuits.

programme.title: AIArtificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Science-fiction fantasy drama directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Jude Law and Haley Joel Osment. In the future, a prototype robot child called David is programmed with emotions and delivered to the Swinton family. But can David replace the sick son that the family has had cryogenically frozen until his terminal illness can be cured?

programme.title: 2001a Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Keir Dullea stars in Stanley Kubrick's ground-breaking science-fiction epic, which depicts the evolution of man - from primitive apes to the 21st century - through the medium of space travel.

A crack team of commandos is assembled for this perilous mission, each with a special and deadly talent.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning film version of Lionel Bart's musical based on the popular novel Oliver Twist, starring Ron Moody, Oliver Reed and Mark Lester. Escaping a life of workhouse servitude, Oliver tries to seek his fortune in London, but instead of gold-paved streets he finds the roguish Fagin and his crime school for boys.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Audrey Hepburn and Gregory Peck. Joe Bradley, a journalist at an American news bureau in Rome, discovers a pretty girl apparently in a drunken stupor and reluctantly takes her home. Next morning, he is amazed to discover that his guest is a princess on a state visit.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring John Wayne and Maureen O'Hara. Sean Thornton returns to his native Galway to settle down in peace after growing up in America. The quiet life still eludes him, however, as he finds himself reluctantly sparring with his neighbours, his sweetheart and his conscience.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Julia Roberts. When she loses a lawsuit following a car accident, unemployed single mother Erin Brockovich browbeats her lawyer, Ed Masry, into giving her a job. When he is unable to convince anyone of his sighting, Neary's strange behaviour starts to worry his family.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Thriller starring Harrison Ford and Tommy Lee Jones. Despite protesting his innocence, Richard Kimble is sentenced to death for the murder of his wife. En route to prison, he is caught up in a disastrous escape attempt, and finds himself on the run. In order to clear his name, he must find the mysterious one-armed man with whom he struggled on the night of the murder, but the law is hot on his trail.

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: Oscar-winning period thriller starring Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway and John Huston. When private eye JJ Gittes is hired to investigate the husband of a rich Los Angeles socialite, he stumbles into a web of deceit and murder and uncovers a terrible secret from the past.

programme.title: MandelaLong Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: Drama based on Nelson Mandela's 1995 autobiography, starring Idris Elba and Naomie Harris. Apartheid South Africa: when Nelson Mandela began studying law in the 1940s, little did he know that it would take him on a path to radical activism with the African National Party, decades of imprisonment after being convicted of treason and eventual release to become the first black president of South Africa.

programme.title: Roman Holiday

Joe Bradley, a journalist at an American news bureau in Rome, discovers a pretty girl apparently in a drunken stupor and reluctantly takes her home. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films for May 2022.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: Oscar-winning western starring John Wayne as one-eyed US marshal "Rooster" Cogburn. When a young girl discovers that her father has been robbed and murdered, she persuades the hard-drinking Cogburn to track down the killer.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments
programme.desc: Egyptian prince Moses discovers his real roots are Hebrew after being banished from the land by his jealous half-brother. He returns from exile on a quest to free his people from enslavement by the new pharaoh, and warns of terrifying consequences if the ruler fails to let his people go. Cecil B DeMille's biblical epic, starring Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Edward G Robinson and Anne Baxter.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: A tough, embittered US marine sergeant sets out to mould a group of raw recruits into men fit for action against the Japanese in the Pacific during the Second World War. Although his training methods are often brutal, his controversial approach looks set to pay dividends when they finally see real combat. Adventure, starring John Wayne, John Agar, Adele Mara and Forrest Tucker.

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: Oscar-winning period thriller starring Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway and John Huston. When private eye JJ Gittes is hired to investigate the husband of a rich Los Angeles socialite, he stumbles into a web of deceit and murder and uncovers a terrible secret from the past.

En route to prison, he is caught up in a disastrous escape attempt, and finds himself on the run. In order to clear his name, he must find the mysterious one-armed man with whom he struggled on the night of the murder, but the law is hot on his trail.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Oscar-winning crime thriller from the Coen brothers, starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin. After going on the run with $2 million from a botched desert drugs deal, hapless cowboy Llewelyn Moss is pursued across Texas by sociopathic hitman Anton Chigurh and ageing sheriff Ed Tom Bell.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Eddie Murphy. An old friend's murder leads impulsive Detroit detective Axel Foley to glamorous Los Angeles in search of information about the killing. A law unto himself, Foley's streetwise attitude soon makes him enemies among the cops and the crooks.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Biographical crime drama starring Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe. Following the death of his mentor, Frank Lucas establishes himself as the number one distributor of heroin in the US by coming up with a unique new method of importing. But then he attracts the attention of dogged Newark detective Richie Roberts.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments
programme.desc: Egyptian prince Moses discovers his real roots are Hebrew after being banished from the land by his jealous half-brother. He returns from exile on a quest to free his people from enslavement by the new pharaoh, and warns of terrifying consequences if the ruler fails to let his people go. Cecil B DeMille's biblical epic, starring Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Edward G Robinson and Anne Baxter.

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Mickey Kelley, a former Marine and one of the first American black belts in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, gets pulled away from everything he loves and into an unsanctioned MMA tournament. Sporting drama, starring Sean Patrick Flanery, Katrina Bowden and Dennis Quaid.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: A fighter pilot crash lands on a mysterious island inhabited by a race of Amazon warriors, but his intrusion unleashes the evil god of war they have been keeping captive. A princess of the superhuman race travels to the modern world to recapture the evil creature. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Keri Russell, Nathan Fillion and Alfred Molina.

programme.title: Great White
programme.desc: A fun-filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden, Aaron Jakubenko and Kimie Tsukakoshi.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith. When a New York police officer is recruited by a top-secret agency that monitors alien activity he finds himself in a race against time to save the Earth from destruction.

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Sharlto Copley. Nearly thirty years after aliens landed near Johannesburg, the extraterrestrial visitors are living in a squalid refugee camp called District 9. With the initial welcoming attitude of the human population long since faded, the order is given for the space visitors to be forcibly evicted. For one man, the operation will be a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Cpt Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Great White
programme.desc: A fun-filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden, Aaron Jakubenko and Kimie Tsukakoshi.

programme.title: The Dustwalker
programme.desc: After an alien spaceship crashes in a desert, a local town starts falling victim to a parasite which turns the residents into lethal killing machines. The inhabitants must fight back before they are wiped out. Writer/director Sandra Scibettas's sci-fi thriller, starring Jolene Anderson, Stef Dawson and Talina Naviede.

programme.title: Snatchers
programme.desc: Status-obsessed high-school student Sara has sex for the first time with her boyfriend Skyler. However, she wakes up the next day nine months pregnant - giving birth to an alien creature that attacks and kills everyone in the clinic. Comedy horror, starring Mary Nepi and Gabrielle Elyse.

programme.title: Critters Attack!
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Drea reluctantly takes a job babysitting for the professor of a college she hopes to attend. Struggling to entertain the professor's children Trissy and Jake, along with her own little brother Phillip, Drea takes them on a hike, unaware that mysterious alien critters have crash-landed and started devouring every living thing they encounter. Horror comedy, starring Tashiana Washington and Ava Preston.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: Black comedy horror starring Zach Galligan and Phoebe Cates. In a small American town, kindly inventor Rand Peltzer brings home a cute little animal called a mogwai for his son Billy, with three rules for its upkeep: never get the mogwai wet, expose him to light or feed him after midnight. Accidentally, these rules get broken and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith. When a New York police officer is recruited by a top-secret agency that monitors alien activity he finds himself in a race against time to save the Earth from destruction.

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Sharlto Copley. Nearly thirty years after aliens landed near Johannesburg, the extraterrestrial visitors are living in a squalid refugee camp called District 9. With the initial welcoming attitude of the human population long since faded, the order is given for the space visitors to be forcibly evicted. For one man, the operation will be a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Cpt Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Gremlins 2the New Batch
programme.desc: Comedy horror starring Zach Galligan and Phoebe Cates, and featuring Christopher Lee. Billy Peltzer and his fiancée Kate Beringer have moved to New York after surviving the first nightmarish wave of gremlins. Both now work at a hi-tech skyscraper where, unknown to them, their old friend Gizmo is under the influence of the evil Dr Catheter.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy sequel starring Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones. When evil alien queen Serleena threatens Earth's safety, former intergalactic secret agent Kay holds the secret to her destruction. However, Kay is now living a civilian life as a post-office worker and his memory of the past has been erased. Can his former partner Jay persuade him to rejoin the sharp-suited Men in Black and save the world?

programme.title: Godzilla vs Kong
programme.desc: King Kong and his protectors undertake a perilous journey to find his true home, and with them is a young orphaned girl with whom he has formed a unique and powerful bond. But they unexpectedly find themselves in the path of an enraged Godzilla, cutting a swath of destruction across the globe. Sci-fi adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Millie Bobby Brown and Rebecca Hall.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now faces the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realise the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path. Horror sequel, directed by and starring John Krasinski, with Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds and Cillian Murphy.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: Science-fiction action thriller produced by JJ Abrams, creator of TV series Lost. As a group of New York friends throws a leaving party for one of their number, the event is recorded on a video camera. But the city is thrown into panic by an unknown force, with the camera acting as chief witness to the destruction.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Monster horror starring Matthew Broderick and Jean Reno. When a Japanese vessel is sunk in the South Pacific and enormous footprints are discovered in Panama, a team of scientists is brought in to investigate. But radiation expert Niko Tatopoulos has his own theory - nuclear bomb tests have mutated a lizard to gigantic proportions and Manhattan is now under threat.

programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy starring Will Smith and Josh Brolin. The fight against aliens is taken to a new dimension when Agent J is forced to travel back to 1969 in an effort to prevent his partner's murder by ruthless fugitive Boris the Animal.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Cpt Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Fantasy adventure based on the video game, starring Milla Jovovich, Tony Jaa and Ron Perlman.

programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy starring Will Smith and Josh Brolin. The fight against aliens is taken to a new dimension when Agent J is forced to travel back to 1969 in an effort to prevent his partner's murder by ruthless fugitive Boris the Animal.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Comic-book action spin-off from Daredevil, starring Jennifer Garner as the warrior Elektra, who is brought back from the dead by blind martial arts master Stick. Becoming a ruthless hired assassin, she's sent on a mission to kill a father and daughter. But the assignment brings back memories of Elektra's past and she refuses to carry out her orders.

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting US citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Aidan Quinn and Taylor John Smith.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen. Indiana Jones's outrageous exploits take him around the world in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a religious artefact of unspeakable power wanted by the Nazis. With the help of an old flame, Indy takes on his enemies in a terrifying and death-defying battle to the finish.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford returns as intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones in the second entry in Steven Spielberg's action adventure series. On the trail of fortune and glory in Shanghai, Indy is launched on a dangerous new quest that takes him to India via the Himalayas. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indy goes in search of the magical Sankara stone and uncovers an ancient evil that threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford, Sean Connery and Denholm Elliott. When archaeologist Henry Jones disappears, his son Indiana joins in the search for him. In a desperate race against time, Indy encounters some old enemies and once again finds himself in pursuit of an ancient religious artefact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Period action adventure starring Harrison Ford, Ray Winstone, Cate Blanchett and Shia LaBeouf. Nevada in the late 1950s: intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones finds himself up to his neck in trouble again when he encounters Irina Spalko and a gang of Soviet agents at a military base in the desert. However, this is only the start of a series of adventures that will take Indy deep into the Amazon jungle in search of a mysterious crystal skull.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen. Becoming a ruthless hired assassin, she's sent on a mission to kill a father and daughter. But the assignment brings back memories of Elektra's past and she refuses to carry out her orders.

programme.title: Vanquish
programme.desc: A woman tries to put her dark past as a Russian drug courier behind her, but a retired cop forces her to do his bidding by holding her daughter hostage. She must use guns, guts and a motorcycle to take out a series of violent gangsters - or she may never see her child again. Thriller, starring Morgan Freeman and Ruby Rose.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: An ex-soldier is forced into action when armed terrorists take control of a packed football stadium. Action drama, starring Dave Bautista, Pierce Brosnan and Ray Stevenson.

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: Police action thriller starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell. When a captured terrorist offers $100 million to anyone who can spring him from jail, a disgraced SWAT agent is given the chance to redeem himself as LA's underworld takes up the challenge.

programme.title: A Walk among the Tombstones
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Liam Neeson. Former NYPD cop Matt Scudder is, at first, reluctant to take the job of hunting down a gang that kidnapped and ransomed the wife of a wealthy drug dealer. But when it becomes clear these ruthless perpetrators will strike again, Scudder realises they must be stopped.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: Crime thriller starring Noomi Rapace and Colin Farrell. A man who infiltrates a ruthless gang to seek retribution for the murder of his family is forced into an uneasy relationship with a woman hellbent on a revenge mission of her own.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham. When it becomes apparent that someone out for revenge is picking off members of his crew one by one, Dominic Toretto decides the gang should get back together. But barely have they re-assembled than they're co-opted by a shadowy agency figure, who needs the team's special skills to help steal a surveillance device known as God's Eye.

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: Police action thriller starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell. When a captured terrorist offers $100 million to anyone who can spring him from jail, a disgraced SWAT agent is given the chance to redeem himself as LA's underworld takes up the challenge.

programme.title: Rock Dog 2
programme.desc: When Bodi and his band True Blue leave Snow Mountain to tour with pop sensation Lil' Foxy, they learn that fame comes at a price. Animated comedy, with the voices of Graham Hamilton, Kathleen Barr, Michael Adamthwaite and Ashleigh Ball.

programme.title: Leo Da VinciMission Mona Lisa
programme.desc: A young Leonardo Da Vinci is struggling with his incredible inventions, and embarks on an epic adventure with his friends after meeting a mysterious storyteller who tells him about hidden treasures. Animated adventure, with the voices of Johnny Yong Bosch,Cherami Leigh and Bryce Papenbrook.

programme.title: Alpha and Omega 2A Howl-iday Adventure
programme.desc: Wolves Kate and Humphrey are getting ready to celebrate Christmas with their pups. However, when the youngest, Runt, disappears without a trace, they must spend the holidays protecting their family and getting him back. Animation, featuring the voices of Kate Higgins, Ben Diskin and Debi Derryberry.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure, featuring the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles. Super-intelligent dog Mr Peabody and his adopted boy Sherman use their time machine to experience great moments in history. However, when the boy takes fellow student Penny back in time and causes a rift, it's up to his canine mentor to rescue them both before her parents realise she's missing.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Animated action comedy featuring the voices of Shia LaBeouf and Jeff Bridges. Rockhopper penguin Cody Maverick is determined to win the "Big Z Memorial Surf Off", an event named after the surfing legend he has idolised since childhood.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Animated fantasy comedy featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. Shrek is a grumpy green ogre whose swamp is overrun with homeless traditional fairy-tale characters. To get them evicted by evil Lord Farquaad, he must rescue Princess Fiona from her dragon-guarded tower, with only a talking donkey for company.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the hit animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. On returning from their honeymoon, Shrek and Princess Fiona are invited to stay with her parents in the kingdom of Far Far Away. But King Harold is less than enchanted by his new son-in-law, and the Fairy Godmother has good reason to want the ogre out of Fiona's life. Cue assassin-for hire Puss-in-Boots...

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Fred, Velma and Daphne face their most challenging mystery yet - a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. Along the way, they discover that Scooby has a destiny greater than anyone ever imagined. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Forte, Mark Wahlberg, Jason Isaacs, Zac Efron and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Animated comedy horror featuring the voices of Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Kathleen Turner. With Halloween approaching, three kids attempt to unlock a haunted house's dark secrets before it swallows up unsuspecting trick-or-treaters.

programme.title: The Croods 2a New Age
programme.desc: Still searching for a place to settle down, prehistoric patriarch Grug leads his family to the great unknown. Hoping for the best in an increasingly dangerous world, while trying to come to terms with Eep and Guy's budding romance, Grug stumbles upon a secluded Eden of plenty, containing everything that they have been seeking. However, there is a catch. This area is already occupied by the significantly more evolved Bettermans - Phil, Hope and their daughter Dawn. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Nicolas Cage, Emma Stone and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Animated action comedy featuring the voices of Shia LaBeouf and Jeff Bridges. Rockhopper penguin Cody Maverick is determined to win the "Big Z Memorial Surf Off", an event named after the surfing legend he has idolised since childhood.

programme.title: Pil's Adventures
programme.desc: Pil, a young orphan living on the streets of Roc-en-Brume with her three tame weasels, disguises herself and embarks on a quest to save the heir to the throne and victim of an enchantment. Animated adventure.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure from Aardman. Shaun's plan to have a lazy day on Mossy Bottom Farm backfires when a cunning ruse sees the Farmer end up lost in the Big City. Shaun and the flock set off to find him, but to succeed they will have to avoid capture by an eager animal control officer, with nothing but elaborate disguises and quick wits.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: A species of creatures known as `thoriphants" rebel against their life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights. Animated family adventure, with the voices of Lucy Lawless, John Rhys-Davies and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: SpiritStallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: Animated western, featuring the voice of Matt Damon. In the Old West of the late-19th century, a wild mustang called Spirit is captured and sold to a cavalry regiment. Now at the mercy of the regiment's harsh colonel, Spirit vows not to be broken.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Animated comedy spin-off from Madagascar, featuring the guest voices of John Malkovich and Benedict Cumberbatch. Resourceful penguins Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico team up with an undercover organisation to stop a malevolent mollusc from destroying the world.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence and Ashton Kutcher. In a tranquil mountain town, domesticated grizzly bear Boog enjoys an idyllic life as the star of a wildlife show. But when he meets hyperactive deer Elliot, he gets into so much trouble that his keeper decides it's time to release him back into the wild. Problem is, hunting season is fast approaching and there's a tenacious hunter who's determined to bag both Boog and Elliot.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure sequel. Elliott the deer puts his marriage plans on hold to help organise the rescue of Mr Weenie the dachshund, who has been dognapped.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock and David Schwimmer. A zebra called Marty tries to escape his comfortable existence at the Central Park Zoo and return to the wild. Accompanying him, albeit reluctantly, are Alex the lion, a neurotic giraffe and a no-nonsense hippo.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Animated comedy spin-off from Madagascar, featuring the guest voices of John Malkovich and Benedict Cumberbatch. Resourceful penguins Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico team up with an undercover organisation to stop a malevolent mollusc from destroying the world.

programme.title: My Little Ponythe Movie
programme.desc: After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria - where they meet new friends and take on exciting challenges - on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Blunt, Kristin Chenoweth and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: SpiritStallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: Animated western, featuring the voice of Matt Damon. In the Old West of the late-19th century, a wild mustang called Spirit is captured and sold to a cavalry regiment. Now at the mercy of the regiment's harsh colonel, Spirit vows not to be broken.

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: Animated fantasy based on the book by Neil Gaiman, featuring the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher. A little girl finds a hidden door that leads to an eerie parallel world where her "Other Mother" lavishes her with attention, but she soon feels stifled and wants to go home.

programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock and David Schwimmer. A zebra called Marty tries to escape his comfortable existence at the Central Park Zoo and return to the wild. Accompanying him, albeit reluctantly, are Alex the lion, a neurotic giraffe and a no-nonsense hippo.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Tulio and Miguel, two small-time Spanish tricksters, get their hands on a map to El Dorado, the legendary city of gold. After inadvertently stowing away aboard a Mexico-bound ship captained by the famous conquistador Cortes, they find themselves washed up on the shores of the Americas with a horse named Altivo and head off to find the fabled lost city.

programme.title: BarbieSpy Squad
programme.desc: Animated adventure in which gymnasts Barbie, Renee and Teresa are employed as secret agents to catch a diamond thief. With the voices of Erica Lindbeck, Stephanie Sheh and Jenny Pellicer.

programme.title: Tom & JerrySanta's Little Helpers
programme.desc: Merry mayhem ensues until the destructive duo decide to put their differences aside and work as a team in order to save Christmas. Animated short.

programme.title: Happily N'Ever After
programme.desc: Animated fantasy comedy featuring the voices of Sigourney Weaver, Sara Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze Jr. Servant girl Ella battles to restore order after her wicked stepmother tries to tip the balance of power between good and evil so that no fairy-tale can have a happy ending.

programme.title: Happily N'Ever After 2
programme.desc: A selfish princess is driven from her home after falling foul of a scheme by her father's wicked fiance. Stuck out in the wilderness, she makes new friends and learns the importance of helping others before returning to foil her would-be stepmother's plans to take over the kingdom. Animated adventure, with the voice of Helen Niedwick and Jim Sullivan.

programme.title: Valiant
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, John Cleese and Tim Curry. In May 1944, a small but courageous wood pigeon called Valiant does his bit for the war effort by joining the Royal Homing Pigeon Service. But the RHPS is suffering heavy losses owing to the ruthless Nazi falcon brigade under General Von Talen, and Valiant's squad is interrupted in its training and sent on a special mission.

programme.title: The Magic Roundabout
programme.desc: Animated adventure, based on the children's TV classic, featuring the voices of Robbie Williams, Bill Nighy, Ian McKellen and Kylie Minogue. On a manic hunt for sugar, Dougal the dog inadvertently releases evil sorcerer Zeebad from his prison beneath the roundabout. Free after centuries, the malevolent creature aims to cast the world into darkness, but first he has to capture three magic diamonds. Can Dougal and his pals stop Zeebad's wicked plans by getting to the gems first?

programme.title: Animals United
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of James Corden and Stephen Fry. Animals join forces to warn humans about the danger of tampering with nature after a dam cuts off the water supply essential for their survival.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: After moving to a sleepy little town, young Lucky Prescott befriends a wild mustang named Spirit, who shares her rebellious nature. When a heartless wrangler plans to capture Spirit and his herd, Lucky and her new friends embark on the adventure of a lifetime to rescue the horse that changed her life. Animation, with the voice of Isabela Merced.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Animated action comedy based on the popular video game, featuring the voices of Jason Sudeikis, Josh Gad and Danny McBride. On an island populated by happy and contented feathered friends, Red, Chuck and Bomb don't quite fit the mould. But when their home is invaded by mysterious green pigs, it falls to this unlikely trio to save the day.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Andy Samberg and Katie Crown. Following a catastrophic mix-up, the storks at Stork Mountain now deliver everything but babies. But when a human boy asks for a brother, an ace flyer and a teenage misfit team up to help.

programme.title: Howard Lovecraft and the Frozen Kingdom
programme.desc: A boy accidentally opens a portal to a strange alien world full of weird creatures. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Kiefer O'Reilly and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Valiant
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, John Cleese and Tim Curry. In May 1944, a small but courageous wood pigeon called Valiant does his bit for the war effort by joining the Royal Homing Pigeon Service. But the RHPS is suffering heavy losses owing to the ruthless Nazi falcon brigade under General Von Talen, and Valiant's squad is interrupted in its training and sent on a special mission.

programme.title: Animals United
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of James Corden and Stephen Fry. Animals join forces to warn humans about the danger of tampering with nature after a dam cuts off the water supply essential for their survival.

programme.title: Okko's Inn
programme.desc: After losing her parents in a car accident, Okko goes to live in the countryside with her grandmother, who runs a traditional Japanese inn built on top of an ancient spring said to have healing waters. Kitaro Kosaka's animated fantasy, featuring the voices Seiran Kobayashi, Nana Mizuki, Satsumi Matsuda.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong.

Free after centuries, the malevolent creature aims to cast the world into darkness, but first he has to capture three magic diamonds. Can Dougal and his pals stop Zeebad's wicked plans by getting to the gems first?

programme.title: Alpha and OmegaJourney to Bear Kingdom
programme.desc: An epic war breaks out when the Queen Bear and her daughter visit the Eastern Valley. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kate Higgins, Ben Diskin and Debi Derryberry.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep and Bill Murray. Following the birth of their son, Mr Fox agrees to keep his word to his wife that his wild days are behind him. But when the family moves to a new home overlooking the farms of Boggis, Bunce and Bean, Mr Fox is tempted to resume his old poaching ways.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Misguided inventor Flint Lockwood creates a machine that can turn water into food. But what initially seems like the answer to his community's economic crisis soon begins to cause some unexpected problems.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Andy Samberg and Katie Crown. Following a catastrophic mix-up, the storks at Stork Mountain now deliver everything but babies. But when a human boy asks for a brother, an ace flyer and a teenage misfit team up to help.
