When a heartless wrangler plans to capture Spirit and his herd, Lucky and her new friends embark on the adventure of a lifetime to rescue the horse that changed her life. Animation, with the voice of Isabela Merced.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A silver dragon named Firedrake and his friends search for a mythical safe haven hidden in the Himalayas. Animated family adventure based on the novel by Cornelia Funke, featuring the voices of Felicity Jones, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Patrick Stewart and Freddie Highmore.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Animated action comedy based on the popular video game, featuring the voices of Jason Sudeikis, Josh Gad and Danny McBride. On an island populated by happy and contented feathered friends, Red, Chuck and Bomb don't quite fit the mould. But when their home is invaded by mysterious green pigs, it falls to this unlikely trio to save the day.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep and Bill Murray. Following the birth of their son, Mr Fox agrees to keep his word to his wife that his wild days are behind him. But when the family moves to a new home overlooking the farms of Boggis, Bunce and Bean, Mr Fox is tempted to resume his old poaching ways.

programme.title: Ballerina
programme.desc: An aspiring dancer escapes from an orphanage to pursue her dreams, accompanied by her best friend, who wants to be an inventor. They head for Paris, where the would-be ballerina seizes a chance to appear on the stage of the Paris Opera - while her friend becomes an assistant to the creator of the Eiffel Tower. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elle Fanning and Dane DeHaan.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Musical animated adventure featuring the voices of Nicole Kidman, Elijah Wood and Robin Williams. In the freezing Antarctic, Emperor penguins find their soul mate through their own unique "heart song". Unfortunately for young bird Mumble, he can't sing a note, but he can tap dance brilliantly. Social rejection soon follows, leading his "happy feet" to be blamed for a colony-threatening fish famine. Determined to prove his worth, Mumble heads off on a perilous journey to discover the truth about what has happened to the fish stocks.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Misguided inventor Flint Lockwood creates a machine that can turn water into food. But what initially seems like the answer to his community's economic crisis soon begins to cause some unexpected problems.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Will Ferrell and Drew Barrymore. When museum guide Ted learns that his workplace faces closure, he travels to Africa to locate an idol for a fantastic new exhibition. But things don't quite go to plan, especially when a monkey he befriends stows away and follows him back to the big city...

programme.title: Curious George 2Follow That Monkey!
programme.desc: Animated adventure in which cheeky monkey George tries to reunite a baby circus elephant with her family in California. But his kind deed isn't seen as such by everyone.

programme.title: Curious George 3Back to the Jungle
programme.desc: The monkey crash lands in Africa after a space mission does not go to plan. Animated adventure, with the voices of John Goodman, Frank Welker, Jeff Bennett and Gwendoline Yeo.

programme.title: Curious GeorgeRoyal Monkey
programme.desc: Animated adventure in which George trades places with the king's monkey, Philippe. While Philippe puzzles Ted with his flawless manners, George travels to the castle where his fun-loving antics raise eyebrows and bring shy Princess Isabel out of her shell. With the voices of Frank Welker, Jeff Bennett and Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: Curious GeorgeGo West, Go Wild
programme.desc: George and Ted travel to cousin Ginny's farm for a relaxing outdoor weekend, but plans take a turn when her farm animals escape into the wild blue yonder. With the help of Emmett, a friendly farmhand with cowboy dreams, the group sets out to track the herd through the countryside, camp outdoors, fish for their dinner, and stumble into a ghost town. Animated adventure, with the voice of Frank Welker.

programme.title: Alpha and Omega 3the Great Wolf Games
programme.desc: Fed up with the attitude of the Alpha Pack, Humphrey and Cèit don't want to participate in the year's Great Games. However, the cubs have gathered together a rather unusual team of competitors. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ben Diskin and Kate Higgins.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: Animated retelling of the story of Moses, featuring the voices of Val Kilmer and Ralph Fiennes. Rescued by the Queen of Egypt from a reed basket floating on the river Nile, baby Moses is raised as the brother of Rameses, heir to the throne. Years later, when Moses discovers he is really the child of Hebrew slaves, he sets about freeing his people.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Flint Lockwood's mutating machine is no longer turning water into food but producing food/animal hybrids, or foodimals, which very quickly overrun his home town.

programme.title: Igor
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of John Cusack, John Cleese and Steve Buscemi. Igor, a hunchbacked but highly intelligent lab assistant dreams of becoming a mad scientist like his master, hoping to win the annual Evil Science Fair with the scariest monster ever created.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Musical animated adventure featuring the voices of Nicole Kidman, Elijah Wood and Robin Williams. In the freezing Antarctic, Emperor penguins find their soul mate through their own unique "heart song". Unfortunately for young bird Mumble, he can't sing a note, but he can tap dance brilliantly. Social rejection soon follows, leading his "happy feet" to be blamed for a colony-threatening fish famine. Determined to prove his worth, Mumble heads off on a perilous journey to discover the truth about what has happened to the fish stocks.

programme.title: Ballerina
programme.desc: An aspiring dancer escapes from an orphanage to pursue her dreams, accompanied by her best friend, who wants to be an inventor. They head for Paris, where the would-be ballerina seizes a chance to appear on the stage of the Paris Opera - while her friend becomes an assistant to the creator of the Eiffel Tower. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elle Fanning and Dane DeHaan.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence and Ashton Kutcher. In a tranquil mountain town, domesticated grizzly bear Boog enjoys an idyllic life as the star of a wildlife show. But when he meets hyperactive deer Elliot, he gets into so much trouble that his keeper decides it's time to release him back into the wild. Problem is, hunting season is fast approaching and there's a tenacious hunter who's determined to bag both Boog and Elliot.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Animated action comedy featuring the voices of Shia LaBeouf and Jeff Bridges. Rockhopper penguin Cody Maverick is determined to win the "Big Z Memorial Surf Off", an event named after the surfing legend he has idolised since childhood.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Musical animated adventure sequel featuring the voice of Elijah Wood. Mumble and his son Erik must rescue their friends and family in the aftermath of a natural disaster.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animated comedy with the voices of Bill Hader and Anna Faris. Flint Lockwood's mutating machine is no longer turning water into food but producing food/animal hybrids, or foodimals, which very quickly overrun his home town.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Animated sci-fi adventure, featuring the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles. Super-intelligent dog Mr Peabody and his adopted boy Sherman use their time machine to experience great moments in history. However, when the boy takes fellow student Penny back in time and causes a rift, it's up to his canine mentor to rescue them both before her parents realise she's missing.

programme.title: SinbadLegend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: Animated action adventure featuring the voices of Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Michelle Pfeiffer and Joseph Fiennes. When seafaring rogue Sinbad is framed by the goddess of chaos for stealing the Book of Peace, one of the world's most powerful treasures, his best friend Proteus volunteers to die in his place. The only way to stop the execution is to retrieve the book, but will cowardly Sinbad be prepared to embark on such a perilous journey into the unknown?

programme.title: Gambit
programme.desc: Comedy caper starring Colin Firth, Cameron Diaz and Alan Rickman. Art curator Harry Deane is tired of taking grief from his abusive boss, Lionel Shahbandar, so he cooks up a scheme to con the keen art collector into buying a fake Monet. Unfortunately, to pull off the scam he needs the help of a mercurial Texas rodeo queen and that's where Harry's best-laid plans begin to go awry...

programme.title: Bad Therapy
programme.desc: Troubled couple Susan and Bob Howard seek out Judy Small, a marriage counsellor, but she turns out to be an is an unhinged manipulator who causes more problems than she solves. Director William Teitler's comedy drama adapted by Nancy Doyne from her namesake novel, starring Alicia Silverstone, Rob Corddry and Anna Pniowsky.

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Ice Cube and Nia Long. Nick and Suzanne Persons decide that a house in the country would provide the perfect environment for their growing family. But the house has hidden horrors - including dry rot and dodgy plumbing - so they call in eccentric local contractor Chuck, and that's where the problems really begin.

programme.title: Breaking News in Yuba County
programme.desc: When her husband goes missing, underappreciated suburban home-maker Sue Buttons gets a taste of being a local celebrity as she embarks on a city-wide search of Yuba County to find him. Comedy drama, starring Allison Janney, Mila Kunis, Regina Hall and Awkwafina.

programme.title: Barb & Star Go to Vista Del Mar
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Barb and Star leave their small Midwestern town for the first time to go on vacation in Vista Del Mar, Florida. However, they soon find themselves tangled up in adventure, love, and a villain's evil plot to kill everyone in town. Comedy, starring Kristen Wiig, Annie Mumolo and Jamie Dornan.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students in their high school begin to explode inexplicably, a group of seniors begin to adjust to a world where each moment could be their last. Writer/director Brian Duffield's black comedy, based on a novel by Aaron Starmer, starring Katherine Langford, Charlie Plummer and Yvonne Orji.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Robert De Niro and Ben Stiller. Following her engagement to male nurse Greg Focker, Pam Byrnes and her family decamp to Florida to check out the prospective in-laws. But how will uptight ex-CIA man Jack Byrnes react to the free and easy lifestyle of hippy sex therapist Roz Focker and her eccentric husband Bernie?

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Comedy starring Steve Carell and Paul Rudd. Ambitious executive Tim Conrad is keen to be promoted at his company. So when he hears about a monthly event that his boss holds at his mansion, in which guests are invited to bring along an oddball to be ridiculed, Tim is determined to go along. Then eccentric taxidermist Barry Speck enters Tim's life and things will never be the same again.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore. Womanising vet Henry Roth ditches his playboy lifestyle after falling for the charming Lucy. But a car crash has left her with severe short term memory loss, meaning that Henry has to romance her all over again every day in the hope that eventually she'll remember him.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When aliens read signals from 1980s arcade games as a hostile message, it falls to Sam Brenner and his geeky gaming friends to save the world.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg. Two pen-pushing cops seize the opportunity to get out onto the city's mean streets and knock some criminal heads together.

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Crime comedy starring Seth Rogen and James Franco. Stoner Dale Denton witnesses a murder by a crooked cop. In the process of fleeing the scene, Dale drops some of his very rare cannabis, known as "Pineapple Express", which can be traced back to him and his dealer, Saul Silver. Soon the pair find themselves on the run and in the middle of a gang war.

programme.title: Talladega Nightsthe Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen. Nascar racing champion Ricky Bobby has all the trappings of a successful career: a glamorous wife, a luxury home and a fanatical fanbase. But when French driver Jean Girard threatens Ricky's dominance, he seems ill-equipped to meet the challenge.

programme.title: jackass 2.5
programme.desc: Comedy compilation originally released straight to internet, starring Johnny Knoxville and the jackass team, featuring scenes that were cut from their second film.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students in their high school begin to explode inexplicably, a group of seniors begin to adjust to a world where each moment could be their last. Writer/director Brian Duffield's black comedy, based on a novel by Aaron Starmer, starring Katherine Langford, Charlie Plummer and Yvonne Orji.

programme.title: Barb & Star Go to Vista Del Mar
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Barb and Star leave their small Midwestern town for the first time to go on vacation in Vista Del Mar, Florida. However, they soon find themselves tangled up in adventure, love, and a villain's evil plot to kill everyone in town. Comedy, starring Kristen Wiig, Annie Mumolo and Jamie Dornan.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: An indomitable grandmother sets about organising a family get together, but has to deal with a series of crises along the way. One of her nieces reveals a dark side to her husband, while another is falling in love but afraid it will all go wrong. Comedy, directed by and starring Tyler Perry. With Rochelle Aytes and Lisa Arrindell Anderson.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Prison comedy starring Adam Sandler as former American football star Paul "Wrecking" Crewe, whose glory days are now behind him. Jailed for drinking and driving after a car chase through downtown LA, he is forced to form a team of inmates to play against the guards.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day off
programme.desc: Comedy starring Matthew Broderick. Ferris Bueller is smart, and when he plays truant from high school he does it with style. An illicit trip to downtown Chicago involves girlfriend Sloane, best friend Cameron and Cameron's father's prized red Ferrari. Out to foil Ferris are sister Jeanie and Dean of Students Ed Rooney. Will Ferris's luck run out?

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. When aliens read signals from 1980s arcade games as a hostile message, it falls to Sam Brenner and his geeky gaming friends to save the world.

programme.title: Talladega Nightsthe Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen. Nascar racing champion Ricky Bobby has all the trappings of a successful career: a glamorous wife, a luxury home and a fanatical fanbase. But when French driver Jean Girard threatens Ricky's dominance, he seems ill-equipped to meet the challenge.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg. Two pen-pushing cops seize the opportunity to get out onto the city's mean streets and knock some criminal heads together.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: Period comedy adventure starring Steve Coogan and Jackie Chan. Victorian inventor Phileas Fogg is challenged to circumnavigate the globe in eighty days by Lord Kelvin, head of the Royal Academy of Science. Accompanying Fogg on his journey are Passepartout, a man skilled in martial arts and bent on restoring a stolen Jade Buddha to his Chinese village, and French artist Monique.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Jack Nicholson. When a misunderstanding leads to the woefully unassertive Dave Buznik being accused of air rage, he is ordered to attend therapy sessions run by the unconventional Dr Buddy Rydell, who has a few demons of his own.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Comedy starring Kristen Wiig and Rose Byrne. After Lillian announces her engagement, she asks her lifelong pal Annie to be her maid of honour. However, Annie's life is in a mess, and she finds herself losing control over the bachelorette party to Lillian's seemingly perfect new friend Helen.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day off
programme.desc: Comedy starring Matthew Broderick. Ferris Bueller is smart, and when he plays truant from high school he does it with style. An illicit trip to downtown Chicago involves girlfriend Sloane, best friend Cameron and Cameron's father's prized red Ferrari. Out to foil Ferris are sister Jeanie and Dean of Students Ed Rooney. Will Ferris's luck run out?

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: Comedy drama based on a true story, starring Jennifer Aniston and Owen Wilson. Following their wedding, John Grogan buys his wife Jenny a cute, but irrepressible labrador puppy called Marley, little realising that their lives will never be quite the same again.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: An indomitable grandmother sets about organising a family get together, but has to deal with a series of crises along the way. One of her nieces reveals a dark side to her husband, while another is falling in love but afraid it will all go wrong. Comedy, directed by and starring Tyler Perry. With Rochelle Aytes and Lisa Arrindell Anderson.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Songbird
programme.desc: A rock musician enrolls in college after she breaks up with her boyfriend and her band falls apart. Convinced she will give the youngsters a run for their money, she is shocked to discover that no one knows who she is and they couldn't care less about her rock star past. Drama, starring Cobie Smulders, Richard Elis and Jessica Hynes.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Eddie Murphy and Thandie Newton. Mild-mannered Norbit is reunited with his childhood sweetheart Kate when she decides to buy the orphanage where they both grew up as children. But Kate is now engaged to the deceitful Deion and Norbit is married to the overweight Rasputia, whose brothers are planning to turn the orphanage into a strip club. Can Norbit and Kate overcome these obstacles and find true happiness?

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: In remote Western Australia, estranged brothers Colin and Les are at war. Raising separate flocks of sheep descended from their family's prized bloodline, the two men work side by side, yet are worlds apart. When Les's prize ram is diagnosed with a rare and lethal illness, authorities order a purge of every sheep in the valley. While Colin attempts to stealthily outwit the powers that be, Les opts for angry defiance. Comedy drama, starring Sam Neill and Michael Caton.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days
programme.desc: Period comedy adventure starring Steve Coogan and Jackie Chan. Victorian inventor Phileas Fogg is challenged to circumnavigate the globe in eighty days by Lord Kelvin, head of the Royal Academy of Science. Accompanying Fogg on his journey are Passepartout, a man skilled in martial arts and bent on restoring a stolen Jade Buddha to his Chinese village, and French artist Monique.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Comedy starring Kristen Wiig and Rose Byrne. After Lillian announces her engagement, she asks her lifelong pal Annie to be her maid of honour. However, Annie's life is in a mess, and she finds herself losing control over the bachelorette party to Lillian's seemingly perfect new friend Helen.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Jack Nicholson. When a misunderstanding leads to the woefully unassertive Dave Buznik being accused of air rage, he is ordered to attend therapy sessions run by the unconventional Dr Buddy Rydell, who has a few demons of his own.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: Comedy starring Sofia Vergara and Jon Favreau. Brilliant but temperamental chef Carl Casper appears to have kissed his career goodbye after he clashes with a restaurant critic. But determined to work by his own rules, Carl buys a food truck and not only renews his passion for cooking but also reconnects with his family.

programme.title: How To Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Kate Hudson and Matthew McConaughey. When journalist Andie Anderson attempts to woo and lose advertising executive Benjamin Barry in just ten days for an article she's working on, she's unaware that he's out to make her fall in love with him as part of a bet. As the two play their romantic cat-and-mouse game, they begin to realise that their feelings for each other run deeper than they thought.

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg. A father attempts to reconnect with his son by showing up uninvited at his wedding. But there is an ulterior motive for his visit and it's not just about making amends for his years of poor parenting.

programme.title: The Buddy Games
programme.desc: A group of friends reunite to play The Buddy Games, a wild assortment of absurd physical and mental challenges. In the process, they heal old wounds, right past wrongs and figure out the true meaning of friendship. Comedy, directed by and starring Josh Duhamel, with Dax Shepard, Olivia Munn and Kevin Dillon.

programme.title: Rams
programme.desc: In remote Western Australia, estranged brothers Colin and Les are at war. Raising separate flocks of sheep descended from their family's prized bloodline, the two men work side by side, yet are worlds apart. When Les's prize ram is diagnosed with a rare and lethal illness, authorities order a purge of every sheep in the valley. While Colin attempts to stealthily outwit the powers that be, Les opts for angry defiance. Comedy drama, starring Sam Neill and Michael Caton.

But Kate is now engaged to the deceitful Deion and Norbit is married to the overweight Rasputia, whose brothers are planning to turn the orphanage into a strip club. Can Norbit and Kate overcome these obstacles and find true happiness?

programme.title: Come as You Are
programme.desc: Three young men with disabilities hit the road with a jaded nurse driver, heading to a brothel in Montreal catering for people with special needs. Remake of the acclaimed Belgian comedy drama, starring Grant Rosenmeyer, Hayden Szeto, Ravi Patel, Gabourey Sidibe and Janeane Garofalo.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students in their high school begin to explode inexplicably, a group of seniors begin to adjust to a world where each moment could be their last. Writer/director Brian Duffield's black comedy, based on a novel by Aaron Starmer, starring Katherine Langford, Charlie Plummer and Yvonne Orji.

programme.title: 23 Walks
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama telling the story of Dave and Fern, a couple in their 60s who get to know one another over the course of 23 dog walks, set against the dramatic background of the changing seasons of one year. Starring Dave Johns and Alison Steadman.

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: Comedy starring Sofia Vergara and Jon Favreau. Brilliant but temperamental chef Carl Casper appears to have kissed his career goodbye after he clashes with a restaurant critic. But determined to work by his own rules, Carl buys a food truck and not only renews his passion for cooking but also reconnects with his family.

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: Comedy starring Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg. A father attempts to reconnect with his son by showing up uninvited at his wedding. But there is an ulterior motive for his visit and it's not just about making amends for his years of poor parenting.

programme.title: How To Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Kate Hudson and Matthew McConaughey. When journalist Andie Anderson attempts to woo and lose advertising executive Benjamin Barry in just ten days for an article she's working on, she's unaware that he's out to make her fall in love with him as part of a bet. As the two play their romantic cat-and-mouse game, they begin to realise that their feelings for each other run deeper than they thought.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Jackie Chan and Jennifer Love Hewitt. New York City limo driver Jimmy Tong finds himself thrust into the world of international espionage when he dons a hi-tech tuxedo belonging to his secret-agent boss.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.

programme.title: Think like a Man
programme.desc: Four women take the advice of a self-help book on how to control their boyfriends, and are impressed with the results. However, the men also manage to get hold of a copy and conspire to use their inside knowledge to turn the tables. Comedy drama, with Michael Ealy, Taraji P Henson, Jerry Ferrera and Gabrielle Union.

programme.title: The Broken Hearts Gallery
programme.desc: Lucy is a twentysomething art gallery assistant living in New York City, who also happens to be an emotional hoarder. After she gets dumped by her latest boyfriend, Lucy is inspired to create The Broken Hearts Gallery, a pop-up space for the items love has left behind. Word of the gallery spreads, encouraging a movement and a fresh start for all the romantics out there, including Lucy herself. Romantic comedy, starring Geraldine Viswanathan.

programme.title: An American Pickle
programme.desc: A simple Jewish man named Herschel Greenbaum works in a pickle factory in Brooklyn. One day, he falls into a vat of brine and stays there, perfectly preserved, for 100 years. He comes back to life and goes to stay with his great-great-grandson, Ben, in contemporary Brooklyn. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Sarah Snook.

programme.title: Come as You Are
programme.desc: Three young men with disabilities hit the road with a jaded nurse driver, heading to a brothel in Montreal catering for people with special needs. Remake of the acclaimed Belgian comedy drama, starring Grant Rosenmeyer, Hayden Szeto, Ravi Patel, Gabourey Sidibe and Janeane Garofalo.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students in their high school begin to explode inexplicably, a group of seniors begin to adjust to a world where each moment could be their last. Writer/director Brian Duffield's black comedy, based on a novel by Aaron Starmer, starring Katherine Langford, Charlie Plummer and Yvonne Orji.

programme.title: Bad Therapy
programme.desc: Troubled couple Susan and Bob Howard seek out Judy Small, a marriage counsellor, but she turns out to be an is an unhinged manipulator who causes more problems than she solves. Director William Teitler's comedy drama adapted by Nancy Doyne from her namesake novel, starring Alicia Silverstone, Rob Corddry and Anna Pniowsky.

programme.title: Happily
programme.desc: Married couple Tom and Janet's world is turned upside down when a visit from a mysterious stranger leads to a dead body, lots of questions, and a tense couples' trip with friends who may not actually be friends at all. Dark romantic comedy, starring Joel McHale and Kerry Bishe.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: Following the launch of her new novel, 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her old college by a former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate becomes mixed up in the lives of a group of students. Writer/director Kris Rey's comedy drama, starring Gillian Jacobs, Jemaine Clement and Josh Wiggins.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Jackie Chan and Jennifer Love Hewitt. New York City limo driver Jimmy Tong finds himself thrust into the world of international espionage when he dons a hi-tech tuxedo belonging to his secret-agent boss.

programme.title: Think like a Man
programme.desc: Four women take the advice of a self-help book on how to control their boyfriends, and are impressed with the results. However, the men also manage to get hold of a copy and conspire to use their inside knowledge to turn the tables. Comedy drama, with Michael Ealy, Taraji P Henson, Jerry Ferrera and Gabrielle Union.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: A woman moves into a retirement community and starts a cheerleading squad with her fellow residents, proving it's never too late to follow your dreams. Uplifting comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Jacki Weaver, Pam Grier, Celia Weston and Rhea Perlman.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Comedy starring Will Smith and Eva Mendes. Alex "Hitch" Hitchens is a professional and deliberately anonymous New York "date doctor" who helps male clients woo the women of their dreams. But his success leads to trouble when tenacious gossip columnist Sara Melas decides to unmask him.

programme.title: Alan PartridgeAlpha Papa
programme.desc: Comedy starring Steve Coogan. Norwich DJ Alan Partridge is unconcerned when his local radio station, North Norfolk Digital, is bought out by a multinational. But when he finds out that it's either himself or fellow DJ Pat Farrell who must go, Alan makes sure that it's his colleague who gets the boot. However, when a shotgun-wielding Farrell decides to hold the staff hostage, it's up to Norwich's most famous son to save the day.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels. The dastardly duo hit the road to track down Harry's estranged daughter - and a new kidney.

programme.title: The Racer
programme.desc: In the summer of 1998, the opening stages of the Tour de France are relocated to Ireland. Belgian Dom Chabol has been one of the best support riders for 20 years, a sacrificial role with victory never an option. But Dom secretly harbours a desire to wear the yellow jersey just once before his career is over. At the start of what will likely be his last Tour, Dom is unceremoniously dropped from the team he has dedicated his life to. As he gears up to go home and to face his estranged sister, a massive doping error knocks a team-mate off the Tour, and Dom is thrown back in the saddle. Sporting comedy drama, starring Louis Talpe and Matteo Simoni.

programme.title: Wander Darkly
programme.desc: New parents Adrienne and Matteo are forced to reckon with trauma amid their troubled relationship. The couple must revisit the memories of their past and unravel haunting truths in order to face their uncertain future. Drama, starring Sienna Miller, Diego Luna and Beth Grant.

programme.title: My New York Year
programme.desc: In New York City in the late 1990s, a young aspiring writer lands a clerical job at the literary agency of the renowned yet reclusive JD Salinger. While her eccentric and old-fashioned boss tasks her to process Salinger's voluminous fan mail, she struggles to find her own voice. Drama, starring Margaret Qualley and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Sports drama starring Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall and Nicole Kidman. Cocky racing driver Cole Trickle is revved up to take the stock-car circuit by storm, but his aggressive driving style soon lands him in hospital. There he meets Dr Claire Lewicki, who gives the young driver more than racing to think about.

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Sports drama based on a true story, starring Steve Carell, Channing Tatum and Mark Ruffalo. Olympic gold medal-winning wrestlers Mark and Dave Schultz are invited by wealthy philanthropist and fan John du Pont to come and live on his estate and train a team for the 1988 Seoul Olympics. Mark accepts the offer, but du Pont's benevolence hides an obsession that will have ramifications for both brothers.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Drama starring Viggo Mortensen and Frank Langella. Parents Ben and Leslie Cash live off the grid with their six children in a cabin in the backwoods of Washington state where their brood are immersed in left-wing activism and survivalism. However, following a family tragedy, the Cash clan are forced to return to society where they find "normal life" to be a confusing and frightening challenge.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama based on a true story, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Justin Timberlake and Andrew Garfield. Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg is a computer programming genius, but he struggles to fit in with the movers and shakers of the university's elite. As a reaction to not being part of the social scene he creates the online network Facebook, an invention that will make him one of the youngest ever billionaires - but not before he has battled his rivals in court.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford. New York, 1945: in a nightclub, Katie Morosky encounters Hubbell Gardiner, the young man she loved from afar at university. Then, as now, their personalities and goals were very different but in matters of the heart, opposites can attract.

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Sports drama starring Tom Cruise, Robert Duvall and Nicole Kidman. Cocky racing driver Cole Trickle is revved up to take the stock-car circuit by storm, but his aggressive driving style soon lands him in hospital. There he meets Dr Claire Lewicki, who gives the young driver more than racing to think about.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale and Amy Adams. Welterweight boxer "Irish" Micky Ward dreams of a shot at the big time, but loyalty to his dysfunctional family - particularly Dicky, his drug-addicted half-brother and coach - threatens to block his path to greatness.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Music drama starring Miles Teller and J K Simmons. Aspiring jazz drummer Andrew wins a place at a prestigious music conservatory and quickly advances to the school's studio band. But the educational approach of instructor Terence Fletcher consists of intimidating and threatening his students. With Andrew determined to succeed, and Fletcher obsessed with musical perfection, an unpredictable battle of wills unfolds.

programme.title: The People vs Larry Flynt
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Woody Harrelson and Courtney Love. Pornographer Larry Flynt's magazine Hustler takes the world by storm, offending the guardians of good taste but making him a multi-millionaire. When a lawsuit threatens to bring Flynt's empire down, it is not just the man himself that must stand trial - it is also the concept of free speech.

programme.title: The Violent Heart
programme.desc: Fifteen years after witnessing the murder of his older sister Wendy, a troubled man called Daniel finds himself falling for Cassie, a vivacious high-school senior. Writer-director Kerem Sanga's thriller, starring Jovan Adepo, Grace Van Patten, Lukas Haas and Mary J Blige.

programme.title: Rare Beasts
programme.desc: Mandy, a career-driven single mother, juggles raising a son in the midst of a female revolution, mining the pain of her parents' separation, and professionally writing about a love that no longer exists. One day, she meets and falls in love with a troubled man, Pete, who is searching for a sense of worth and belonging. Romantic comedy drama, directed by and starring Billie Piper, with Leo Bill and Kerry Fox.

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: Music drama starring Miles Teller and J K Simmons. Aspiring jazz drummer Andrew wins a place at a prestigious music conservatory and quickly advances to the school's studio band. But the educational approach of instructor Terence Fletcher consists of intimidating and threatening his students. With Andrew determined to succeed, and Fletcher obsessed with musical perfection, an unpredictable battle of wills unfolds.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Drama starring Viggo Mortensen and Frank Langella. Parents Ben and Leslie Cash live off the grid with their six children in a cabin in the backwoods of Washington state where their brood are immersed in left-wing activism and survivalism. However, following a family tragedy, the Cash clan are forced to return to society where they find "normal life" to be a confusing and frightening challenge.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford. New York, 1945: in a nightclub, Katie Morosky encounters Hubbell Gardiner, the young man she loved from afar at university. Then, as now, their personalities and goals were very different but in matters of the heart, opposites can attract.

programme.title: Another Round
programme.desc: Martin, Tommy, Peter and Nikolaj - colleagues and friends who are teachers at the same Copenhagen high school - decide to consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives. Thomas Vinterberg's comedy drama, starring Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen and Magnus Millang. In Danish and Swedish.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: Salesman Ray Kroc attempts to turn two brothers' innovative fast food eatery into the biggest restaurant business in the world. Drama, starring Michael Keaton, Nick Offerman and John Carroll Lynch.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biographical drama starring Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale and Amy Adams. Welterweight boxer "Irish" Micky Ward dreams of a shot at the big time, but loyalty to his dysfunctional family - particularly Dicky, his drug-addicted half-brother and coach - threatens to block his path to greatness.

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Michael Douglas and Matt Damon. Flamboyant pianist Liberace is already one of the most famous entertainers in the world when he meets young Scott Thorson in 1977. Scott is at first seduced and then overpowered by the larger-than-life character and his opulent lifestyle. But their six-year relationship is volatile and kept secret from Liberace's adoring fans.

programme.title: Swallow
programme.desc: Hunter Conrad appears to live a charmed life, with a good husband, a beautiful home and a baby on the way. But as she struggles to meet her controlling family's expectations, she finds herself increasingly compelled to consume dangerous objects, and must confront the dark secret behind her new obsession. Thriller, starring Haley Bennett and Austin Stowell.

programme.title: Rare Beasts
programme.desc: Mandy, a career-driven single mother, juggles raising a son in the midst of a female revolution, mining the pain of her parents' separation, and professionally writing about a love that no longer exists. One day, she meets and falls in love with a troubled man, Pete, who is searching for a sense of worth and belonging. Romantic comedy drama, directed by and starring Billie Piper, with Leo Bill and Kerry Fox.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: Salesman Ray Kroc attempts to turn two brothers' innovative fast food eatery into the biggest restaurant business in the world. Drama, starring Michael Keaton, Nick Offerman and John Carroll Lynch.

programme.title: Thank You for Your Service
programme.desc: A group of US soldiers returning from Iraq struggle to integrate back into family and civilian life, while living with the memory of a war that threatens to destroy them long after they've left the battlefield. Director Jason Hall's drama based on David Finkel's book, starring Miles Teller, Beulah Koale and Joe Cole.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: James Cameron's Oscar-winning blockbuster, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet. During the Titanic's maiden voyage in 1912, penniless artist Jack Dawson falls in love with socialite Rose DeWitt Bukater, who is travelling with her fiancé. Years later, Rose relives the affair and the tragic events that followed, while a salvage crew searches for a priceless diamond said to have been lost in the shipwreck.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Samuel L Jackson. Businessman Ken Carter is recruited to improve the fortunes of a failing high-school basketball team. His exacting standards soon put the players under extreme pressure - both on the court and in the classroom.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Romantic thriller starring Kevin Costner and Whitney Houston. Bodyguard and former secret serviceman Frank Farmer, still haunted by the attempt to assassinate President Reagan, is asked to safeguard superstar singer and actress Rachel Marron who has been receiving death threats. But when Farmer visits Marron's luxurious home he is met with resentment from the singer and those around her.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Satirical comedy drama starring Jim Carrey and Ed Harris. Truman Burbank leads an idyllic life in a perfect town, but what he doesn't know is that since birth his every move has been part of an intricately orchestrated television show.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: James Cameron's Oscar-winning blockbuster, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet. During the Titanic's maiden voyage in 1912, penniless artist Jack Dawson falls in love with socialite Rose DeWitt Bukater, who is travelling with her fiancé. Years later, Rose relives the affair and the tragic events that followed, while a salvage crew searches for a priceless diamond said to have been lost in the shipwreck.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of a small-town high-school football team who beat all the odds to win their state championship. After a crushing defeat ended their previous season, everyone counted the Abilene Eagles out of title contention. Facing doubts and personal challenges both on and off the field, it takes the guidance of their team chaplain and a surrogate father figure for them to realise what they can achieve when they stand united as a team. Drama, starring Milo Gibson and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui.

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. Starring Phoebe Dynevor, Matthew Goode and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Driveways
programme.desc: A lonely boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door. Director Andrew Ahn's drama starring Hong Chau, Lucas Jaye, and in one of his final performances, Brian Dennehy.

programme.title: Land
programme.desc: Edee, in the aftermath of an unfathomable event, finds herself unable to stay connected to the world she once knew and in the face of that uncertainty, retreats to the magnificent but unforgiving wilds of the Rockies. After a local hunter brings her back from the brink of death, she must find a way to live again. Drama, directed by and starring Robin Wright, with Demián Bichir and Sarah Dawn Pledge.

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: Coming-of-age romantic drama starring Emma Watson and Logan Lerman. A shy teenager, new to town, only has his English teacher to talk to before he is befriended by a gay misfit and the boy's attractive stepsister. He quickly falls in love with her, but finding the courage to tell her how he feels might just take too long.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Samuel L Jackson. Businessman Ken Carter is recruited to improve the fortunes of a failing high-school basketball team. His exacting standards soon put the players under extreme pressure - both on the court and in the classroom.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Romantic thriller starring Kevin Costner and Whitney Houston. Bodyguard and former secret serviceman Frank Farmer, still haunted by the attempt to assassinate President Reagan, is asked to safeguard superstar singer and actress Rachel Marron who has been receiving death threats. But when Farmer visits Marron's luxurious home he is met with resentment from the singer and those around her.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Satirical comedy drama starring Jim Carrey and Ed Harris. Truman Burbank leads an idyllic life in a perfect town, but what he doesn't know is that since birth his every move has been part of an intricately orchestrated television show.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.

programme.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Stephen Graham, Aml Ameen and Shantol Jackson. Sent to lie low in Hackney, east London, a hot-headed Jamaican drug runner finds his past catching up with him when he meets his new boss.

programme.title: The World to Come
programme.desc: Somewhere along the 19th-century American East Coast frontier, a farmer's wife and her new neighbour find themselves irrevocably drawn to each other, filling a void in their lives which neither knew existed. Romantic drama, starring Katherine Waterston, Vanessa Kirby and Casey Affleck.

programme.title: The United States vs Billie Holiday
programme.desc: The acclaimed singer is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with who she had a tumultuous affair. Director Lee Daniels' biopic based on the novel by Johann Hari, starring Andra Day, Trevante Rhodes and Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: Coming-of-age romantic drama starring Emma Watson and Logan Lerman. A shy teenager, new to town, only has his English teacher to talk to before he is befriended by a gay misfit and the boy's attractive stepsister. He quickly falls in love with her, but finding the courage to tell her how he feels might just take too long.

programme.title: Land
programme.desc: Edee, in the aftermath of an unfathomable event, finds herself unable to stay connected to the world she once knew and in the face of that uncertainty, retreats to the magnificent but unforgiving wilds of the Rockies. After a local hunter brings her back from the brink of death, she must find a way to live again. Drama, directed by and starring Robin Wright, with Demián Bichir and Sarah Dawn Pledge.

programme.title: Driveways
programme.desc: A lonely boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door. Director Andrew Ahn's drama starring Hong Chau, Lucas Jaye, and in one of his final performances, Brian Dennehy.

programme.title: Good Posture
programme.desc: A lazy, but charming and beautiful young woman who has got used to using men to make her life easier, is forced to discover that she can live a happier life by taking responsibility for herself and not rely on those around her as easy props. Comedy drama, starring Grace Van Patten, Gary Richardson and Emily Mortimer.

programme.title: The United States vs Billie Holiday
programme.desc: The acclaimed singer is targeted by the Federal Department of Narcotics with an undercover sting operation led by Federal Agent Jimmy Fletcher, with who she had a tumultuous affair. Director Lee Daniels' biopic based on the novel by Johann Hari, starring Andra Day, Trevante Rhodes and Natasha Lyonne.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Gerard Butler and Katherine Heigl. TV producer Abby Richter is a born romantic despite being unlucky in love. So when her station hires blunt presenter Mike Chadway, who holds a far more cynical view of relationships, it's inevitable that the pair will clash. But is it Mike or Abby who proves to have the correct take on affairs of the heart?

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: Two brothers try to escape their circumstances by travelling across America for a no-holds-barred boxing match that becomes a fight for their lives. Director Max Winkler's drama, starring Charlie Hunnam, Jack O'Connell and Jonathan Majors.

programme.title: The World to Come
programme.desc: Somewhere along the 19th-century American East Coast frontier, a farmer's wife and her new neighbour find themselves irrevocably drawn to each other, filling a void in their lives which neither knew existed. Romantic drama, starring Katherine Waterston, Vanessa Kirby and Casey Affleck.

programme.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Stephen Graham, Aml Ameen and Shantol Jackson. Sent to lie low in Hackney, east London, a hot-headed Jamaican drug runner finds his past catching up with him when he meets his new boss.

programme.title: Mass
programme.desc: Years after an unspeakable tragedy tore their lives apart, two sets of grieving parents agree to talk privately about what happened, in an attempt to move forward. First-time director Fran Kranz' drama, starring Jason Isaacs, Martha Plimpton, Reed Birney and Ann Dowd.

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: Dream Alliance is an unlikely racehorse bred by small-town Welsh bartender Jan Vokes. With no experience, Jan convinces her neighbours to chip in their modest earnings to help train the horse, in the hopes he can compete with the racing elites. Comedy drama based on a true story, starring Toni Collette, Damian Lewis and Owen Teale.

programme.title: The Light between Oceans
programme.desc: Drama based on the novel by ML Stedman, starring Michael Fassbender, Alicia Vikander and Rachel Weisz. First World War veteran Tom Sherbourne and his new wife Isabel are the keepers of a remote lighthouse in Australia. A child is the one thing they need to make their idyllic life complete but their dreams continue to be frustrated, until they discover a baby washed up in an abandoned rowboat.

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: Jennifer Carter and Solomon Chau are a fun-loving, newly engaged couple who are ready to start their lives together. But when Solomon is diagnosed with terminal liver cancer, their hopes for a summer wedding become impossible. With time running out, their friends and families soon devise an inspirational plan to help Jennifer and Solomon realise their dream wedding. Romantic drama, starring Jessica Rothe and Harry Shum Jr.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Horror from the director of Cabin Fever, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson. Lured into darkest Slovakia by the promise of casual sex with easy local girls, three excited backpackers instead stumble upon the nightmarish world of a snuff ring.

programme.title: Spell
programme.desc: A man crash-lands in rural Appalachia and awakens in the attic of a traditional Hoodoo practitioner. He desperately tries to break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual, before the rise of the blood moon. Horror, starring Omari Hardwick and Loretta Devine.

programme.title: Proximity
programme.desc: A young scientist is abducted by extra-terrestrials, but when no one believes his story he becomes obsessed with finding proof, which leads him on a journey of discovery. Writer/director Eric Demeusy's sci-fi drama, starring Ryan Masson, Highdee Kuan and Christian Prentice.

programme.title: Tides
programme.desc: A female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, is forced to decide the fate of the barren wasteland's remaining populace. Sci-fi thriller set in the distant future, starring Nora Arnezeder, Iain Glen and Sarah-Sofie Boussnina.

programme.title: Terminator 3Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. John Connor, now in his 20s, is visited by the same Terminator cyborg who came from the future to protect him ten years ago. This time his life is in danger from an all-new killing machine, the TX, which takes female human form and can control other machines telepathically. Can good defeat evil before the end of the world is set in motion?

programme.title: Willy's Wonderland
programme.desc: A quiet drifter is stranded in a remote town when his car breaks down. Unable to pay for the repairs he needs, he agrees to spend the night cleaning Willy's Wonderland, an abandoned amusement park. However, he soon finds himself trapped inside and locked in an epic battle with the possessed animatronic mascots that roam the halls. Horror comedy, starring Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: In the Earth
programme.desc: As the world searches for a cure to a disastrous virus, a scientist and park scout venture deep in the forest for a routine equipment run. Through the night, their journey becomes a terrifying voyage through the heart of darkness, the forest coming to life around them. Director Ben Wheatley's horror, starring Joel Fry and Reece Shearsmith.

programme.title: Tides
programme.desc: A female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, is forced to decide the fate of the barren wasteland's remaining populace. Sci-fi thriller set in the distant future, starring Nora Arnezeder, Iain Glen and Sarah-Sofie Boussnina.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.

programme.title: Cosmic Sin
programme.desc: Seven rogue soldiers launch a pre-emptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilisation in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts. Co-writer/director Edward Drake's sci-fi thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Bruce Willis and Brandon Thomas Lee.

programme.title: In the Earth
programme.desc: As the world searches for a cure to a disastrous virus, a scientist and park scout venture deep in the forest for a routine equipment run. Through the night, their journey becomes a terrifying voyage through the heart of darkness, the forest coming to life around them. Director Ben Wheatley's horror, starring Joel Fry and Reece Shearsmith.

programme.title: Don't Breathe 2
programme.desc: Hiding out for years in an isolated cabin, Norman Nordstrom has taken in and raised a young girl orphaned from a house fire. However, their quiet existence is shattered when a group of kidnappers show up and take the girl, forcing Norman to leave his safe haven to save her. Horror sequel, starring Stephen Lang.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.

programme.title: Cosmic Sin
programme.desc: Seven rogue soldiers launch a pre-emptive strike against a newly discovered alien civilisation in the hopes of ending an interstellar war before it starts. Co-writer/director Edward Drake's sci-fi thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Bruce Willis and Brandon Thomas Lee.

programme.title: Willy's Wonderland
programme.desc: A quiet drifter is stranded in a remote town when his car breaks down. Unable to pay for the repairs he needs, he agrees to spend the night cleaning Willy's Wonderland, an abandoned amusement park. However, he soon finds himself trapped inside and locked in an epic battle with the possessed animatronic mascots that roam the halls. Horror comedy, starring Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Terminator 3Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. John Connor, now in his 20s, is visited by the same Terminator cyborg who came from the future to protect him ten years ago. This time his life is in danger from an all-new killing machine, the TX, which takes female human form and can control other machines telepathically. Can good defeat evil before the end of the world is set in motion?

programme.title: Sorority Row
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Briana Evigan. After a prank results in the death of a female student, the girls who are covering up the incident are targeted by a serial killer.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Aaron Eckhart and Hilary Swank. When the Earth's core stops rotating, mankind suffers a series of disasters, including devastating electrical storms and exposure to solar radiation. A top team of scientists is assembled to design and pilot a machine to burrow to the centre of the Earth and set the core spinning again.

programme.title: Freaky
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Millie Kessler spends her days trying to survive high school and the cruel actions of the popular crowd. But when she becomes the latest target of the Butcher, the town's infamous serial killer, her senior year becomes the least of her worries. When the Butcher's mystical dagger causes him and Millie to magically switch bodies, the frightened teen learns she has just 24 hours to get her identity back before she looks like a middle-aged maniac for ever. Comedy horror, starring Vince Vaughn and Kathryn Newton.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: Members of an underground movement, no longer satisfied with the annual night of anarchy and murder, decide to take over the United States through an unending campaign of mayhem and massacre. On the morning after The Purge, a masked gang of killers attacks a wealthy Texas ranching family and their workers. Exposed by daylight, the two families are forced to band together and fight back as the country spirals into chaos and begins to disintegrate around them. Horror sequel, starring Ana de la Reguera.

programme.title: Aeonflux
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller based on the MTV animated series, starring Charlize Theron. In 2415, the human survivors of a killer virus live in a walled hi-tech paradise called Bregna. Among the residents, rebel agent Aeon Flux is given the chance to avenge the murder of her sister when she's assigned to assassinate Bregna's dictator Chairman Trevor Goodchild.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Aaron Eckhart and Hilary Swank. When the Earth's core stops rotating, mankind suffers a series of disasters, including devastating electrical storms and exposure to solar radiation. programme.title: Reminiscence
programme.desc: Nick Bannister, a private investigator of the mind, navigates the alluring world of the past when his life is changed by new client Mae. A simple case becomes an obsession after she disappears, and he fights to learn the truth about her. Sci-fi romance, starring Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson and Thandiwe Newton.

programme.title: Aeonflux
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller based on the MTV animated series, starring Charlize Theron. In 2415, the human survivors of a killer virus live in a walled hi-tech paradise called Bregna. Among the residents, rebel agent Aeon Flux is given the chance to avenge the murder of her sister when she's assigned to assassinate Bregna's dictator Chairman Trevor Goodchild.

A lowly utility worker is called to the future by a mysterious radio signal. He must leave his dying wife to embark on a journey that will force him to face his deepest fears in an attempt to change the fabric of reality and save humankind from its greatest environmental crisis yet. Sci-fi drama, starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Ryan Kwanten.

programme.title: Sorority Row
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Briana Evigan. After a prank results in the death of a female student, the girls who are covering up the incident are targeted by a serial killer.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Minor Premise
programme.desc: Attempting to surpass his father's legacy, a reclusive neuroscientist becomes entangled in his own experiment, pitting 10 fragments of his consciousness against each other. Director Eric Schultz's sci-fi thriller, starring Sathya Sridharan, Paton Ashbrook and Dana Ashbrook.

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Sharlto Copley. Nearly thirty years after aliens landed near Johannesburg, the extraterrestrial visitors are living in a squalid refugee camp called District 9. With the initial welcoming attitude of the human population long since faded, the order is given for the space visitors to be forcibly evicted. For one man, the operation will be a life-changing experience.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen and Amanda Seyfried. In a world of smart optical technology, anyone's personal data can be viewed at a single glance, mostly eliminating crime. When a hacker, "Anon", starts editing people's records, a detective faces a reality-bending challenge.

programme.title: Pan's Labyrinth
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fantasy horror directed by Guillermo del Toro and starring Ivana Baquero. In the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War, young Ofelia and her pregnant mother move to a remote village to join her new stepfather, a fascist soldier. There she encounters a faun who tells her she must complete three perilous tasks to claim her rightful place as a princess.

programme.title: The Conjuringthe Devil Made Me Do It
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren look into a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession. One of the most sensational cases from their files, it starts with a fight for the soul of a young boy, then takes them beyond anything they have ever seen before - marking the first time in US history that a murder suspect would claim demonic possession as a defence. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson and Vera Farmiga.

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Sharlto Copley. Nearly thirty years after aliens landed near Johannesburg, the extraterrestrial visitors are living in a squalid refugee camp called District 9. With the initial welcoming attitude of the human population long since faded, the order is given for the space visitors to be forcibly evicted. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson and Vera Farmiga.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: A hearing-impaired girl is visited by the Virgin Mary and can suddenly hear, speak and heal the sick. As people flock to witness her miracles, terrifying events unfold. Are they the work of the Virgin Mary or something much more sinister? Horror, starring Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Cricket Brown and William Sadler.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Clive Owen and Amanda Seyfried. In a world of smart optical technology, anyone's personal data can be viewed at a single glance, mostly eliminating crime. When a hacker, "Anon", starts editing people's records, a detective faces a reality-bending challenge.

programme.title: Minor Premise

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films for May 2022.

programme.title: Endless
programme.desc: When madly-in-love high-school graduates Riley and Chris are separated by a tragic car accident, Riley blames herself for her boyfriend's death while Chris is stranded in limbo. Miraculously, however, the two find a way to connect. Director Scott Speer's drama, starring Alexandra Shipp and Nicholas Hamilton.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss and Laurence Fishburne. When unassuming computer hacker Neo is sought out by Morpheus, a notorious subversive, he learns that the world is not as it seems, and that he must join the fight to free humanity from the all-powerful Matrix.

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller sequel to The Matrix, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss and Laurence Fishburne. Understanding the complexities of the Matrix, Morpheus is convinced that Neo is the prophesied messiah, the "One" to lead humankind from its bondage to machines. But Zion, the human citadel, is soon to be attacked.

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: Conclusion to The Matrix trilogy, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss and Laurence Fishburne. As a mighty army of machines approaches Zion on a mission of biblical destruction, the human forces prepare for battle. Meanwhile, Neo is held captive by the Merovingian as the evil Agent Smith increases his control over the Matrix itself.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Space thriller starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. Two astronauts become stranded in orbit when an avalanche of debris from a decommissioned satellite rips their shuttle to pieces. Their only hope for survival is to get to the International Space Station before their dwindling air supply disappears completely.
