As a mighty army of machines approaches Zion on a mission of biblical destruction, the human forces prepare for battle. Meanwhile, Neo is held captive by the Merovingian as the evil Agent Smith increases his control over the Matrix itself.

programme.title: Malignant
programme.desc: A troubled young woman named Madison is paralysed by shocking visions of grisly murders, baffling both herself and the local detectives in Seattle. Her torment soon worsens as she discovers these dreams are in fact terrifying realities. Horror, starring Annabelle Wallis, Maddie Hasson and George Young.

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects
programme.desc: Road-movie sequel to House of 1000 Corpses, starring Sid Haig, Bill Moseley and Sheri Moon. The murderous Firefly family finally find their depraved crimes catching up with them after Sheriff Wydell, determined to avenge his brother's murder, leads a raid on their home. On the run, they resort to increasingly extreme measures to stay one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Captive State
programme.desc: In a working-class Chicago neighbourhood occupied by an alien force for nine years, increased surveillance and the restriction of civil rights have given rise to an authoritarian system - and dissent among the populace. Sci-fi thriller, starring John Goodman, Ashton Sanders, Jonathan Majors and Vera Farmiga.

programme.title: Robot & Frank
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy drama starring Frank Langella. The near future: former jewel thief Frank receives a robot butler from his son, which is programmed to look after him in his twilight years. However, it soon occurs to Frank that his mechanical helper could be very useful in a heist.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Jamie Foxx. Stealth bomber pilots Ben Gannon, Kara Wade and Henry Purcell embark upon a perilous mission to regain control of a computer-piloted plane that seems intent on bombing Tajikistan.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: A pregnant woman returns to her recently-deceased grandparents' old family home to spend time with her estranged mother, but what begins as a tenuous reunion slowly turns terrifying. Horror, starring Julia Ormond, Emma Draper and Cohen Holloway.

programme.title: The Final Wish
programme.desc: Following the death of his dad, law student Aaron Hammond returns home to help his grief-stricken mother and to confront his past. Going through his father's belongings, he discovers a mysterious urn that changes his life forever. Director Timothy Woodward Jr's horror thriller, starring Michael Welch, Lin Shaye and Spencer Locke.

programme.title: The Dustwalker
programme.desc: After an alien spaceship crashes in a desert, a local town starts falling victim to a parasite which turns the residents into lethal killing machines. The inhabitants must fight back before they are wiped out. Writer/director Sandra Scibettas's sci-fi thriller, starring Jolene Anderson, Stef Dawson and Talina Naviede.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Jamie Foxx. Stealth bomber pilots Ben Gannon, Kara Wade and Henry Purcell embark upon a perilous mission to regain control of a computer-piloted plane that seems intent on bombing Tajikistan.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Sci-fi action drama starring Tom Cruise and Emily Blunt. After being killed on his first day of combat in a war against aliens, Major William Cage finds himself in a time loop, living the same day over and over again. Gaining more knowledge each time he is killed, Cage realises that the key to victory is for him to keep on dying.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now faces the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realise the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path. Horror sequel, directed by and starring John Krasinski, with Emily Blunt, Millicent Simmonds and Cillian Murphy.

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: Remake of the 1976 horror classic, starring Liev Schreiber and Julia Stiles. When Katherine, the wife of American diplomat Robert Thorn, loses her child at birth, her husband is persuaded by a Catholic priest to substitute an orphan baby, whom he names Damien. But over the years, as one bizarre and frightening event follows another, Katherine comes to the chilling realisation that the child is the Antichrist.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Horror from the director of Cabin Fever, starring Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson and Eythor Gudjonsson. Lured into darkest Slovakia by the promise of casual sex with easy local girls, three excited backpackers instead stumble upon the nightmarish world of a snuff ring.

programme.title: Silk Road
programme.desc: DEA agent Rick Bowden is reassigned to cyber crime, and following a visit to one of his informants, Bowden begins gathering evidence on Silk Road, which is generating $1.2million a day through the anonymous sale of narcotics. Meanwhile, site owner Ross Ulbricht ignores the dire warnings of girlfriend Julia and best friend Max to obsessively expand his empire, with the help of one of his most trusted vendors. Thriller, starring Nick Robinson, Jason Clarke and Jennifer Yun.

programme.title: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: Kidnapping victim Samantha Andretti turns up alive after being missing for 15 years. After hearing the news, profiler Dr Green and private investigator Bruno Genko join forces to piece together the mystery and track down her captor. Starring Dustin Hoffman, Toni Servillo and Valentina Belle. In Italian and English.

programme.title: Finding Steve McQueen
programme.desc: In 1972, a gang of thieves plan a heist to steal $30million in illegal campaign contributions from President Richard Nixon's secret fund. Based on one of the biggest bank heists in US history, director Mark Steven Johnson's crime caper stars Travis Fimmel, Rachael Taylor, William Fichtner and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Last Moment of Clarity
programme.desc: Three years after witnessing the murder of his fiancee, a man becomes a fearful drifter. One day, at a Parisian cinema, he sees an actress who looks a lot like his dead lover and embarks on a mission to uncover the truth. Thriller directed by Colin and James Krisel, and starring Zach Avery, Brian Cox, Samara Weaving and Carly Chaikin.

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: Retired sheriff George Blackledge and his horse trainer wife Margaret live on a ranch in 1960s Montana, with their son James, his wife Lorna and their son Jimmy. A freak riding accident takes James' life, and the Blackledges watch helplessly as Lorna eventually marries Donnie, who communicates with his fists. Without warning, Donnie spirits Lorna and three-year-old Jimmy away to his family home in North Dakota. Crime drama, starring Kevin Costner, Diane Lane and Kayli Carter.

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: Crime drama based on the 1970s TV series, starring Ray Winstone and Ben Drew. Old-school detective Jack Regan must use all his guile - and some questionable methods - to bring a murderous jewel thief to book. But not for the first time, Regan's uncompromising police work will bring him into conflict with his superiors.

programme.title: The Big Ugly
programme.desc: Anglo-American relations go bad when London mob bosses invest in a West Virginia oil deal in hopes of laundering dirty money. Writer/director Scott Wiper's drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Malcolm McDowell and Ron Perlman.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Thriller starring Matthew Fox, Dennis Quaid and Forest Whitaker. When an assassination attempt is made on the US President after he arrives in Spain for a landmark summit, chaos ensues. Eight strangers, each with different points of view on the event, believe they hold the key to unlocking the truth about the attack.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day. M Night Shyamalan's horror, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Vicky Krieps and Rufus Sewell.

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: Crime drama based on the 1970s TV series, starring Ray Winstone and Ben Drew. Old-school detective Jack Regan must use all his guile - and some questionable methods - to bring a murderous jewel thief to book. But not for the first time, Regan's uncompromising police work will bring him into conflict with his superiors.

programme.title: Training Day
programme.desc: Police drama starring Denzel Washington and Ethan Hawke. Idealistic rookie cop Jake Hoyt is given the opportunity of trying out with an elite Los Angeles undercover narcotics squad. Hoyt joins Detective Sergeant Alonzo Harris for a day working the streets, but quickly realises that his superior's approach to law enforcement is not strictly by the book.

programme.title: Dragged across Concrete
programme.desc: Two overzealous cops get suspended from the force when a video of their strong-arm tactics is leaked. Low on cash and with no other options, they delve into the criminal underworld to get their proper compensation, but find far more than they wanted awaiting them in the shadows. Crime drama, starring Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn.

programme.title: Last Moment of Clarity
programme.desc: Three years after witnessing the murder of his fiancee, a man becomes a fearful drifter. One day, at a Parisian cinema, he sees an actress who looks a lot like his dead lover and embarks on a mission to uncover the truth. Thriller directed by Colin and James Krisel, and starring Zach Avery, Brian Cox, Samara Weaving and Carly Chaikin.

programme.title: Finding Steve McQueen
programme.desc: In 1972, a gang of thieves plan a heist to steal $30million in illegal campaign contributions from President Richard Nixon's secret fund. Based on one of the biggest bank heists in US history, director Mark Steven Johnson's crime caper stars Travis Fimmel, Rachael Taylor, William Fichtner and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: No Man's Land
programme.desc: While out on a father-son border patrol, a man named Jackson kills a Mexican immigrant boy. His father tries taking the blame, but Jackson flees south on horseback, becoming a gringo `illegal alien" in Mexico. Chased by Texas Rangers and Mexican federales, Jackson journeys across Mexico to seek forgiveness from the dead boy's father, only to fall in love with the land he was taught to hate. Action adventure, starring Jake Allyn and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

programme.title: KIMI
programme.desc: During the Covid-19 pandemic in Seattle, an agoraphobic tech worker discovers evidence of a violent crime while reviewing a data stream, and is met with resistance and bureaucracy when she tries reporting it to her company. She soon realises she must face her greatest fear by venturing out of her apartment and into the streets, which are filled with protestors after the city council passes a law restricting the movements of the homeless population. Crime thriller, starring Zoë Kravitz, Devin Ratray and Rita Wilson.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Psychological thriller remake of director John Frankenheimer's 1962 classic, starring Denzel Washington, Meryl Streep and Liev Schreiber. Following his experiences in the the first Gulf War, tormented US Army major Bennett Marco becomes the key to a complex political conspiracy when a decorated member of his patrol makes a bid for the White House.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Crime comedy drama, starring John Boyega, Olivia Cooke, Bill Skarsgard and Ed Skrein.

Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.

She soon realises she must face her greatest fear by venturing out of her apartment and into the streets, which are filled with protestors after the city council passes a law restricting the movements of the homeless population. Crime thriller, starring Zoë Kravitz, Devin Ratray and Rita Wilson.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Biographical crime drama starring Denzel Washington and Russell Crowe. Following the death of his mentor, Frank Lucas establishes himself as the number one distributor of heroin in the US by coming up with a unique new method of importing. But then he attracts the attention of dogged Newark detective Richie Roberts.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Psychological thriller remake of director John Frankenheimer's 1962 classic, starring Denzel Washington, Meryl Streep and Liev Schreiber. Following his experiences in the the first Gulf War, tormented US Army major Bennett Marco becomes the key to a complex political conspiracy when a decorated member of his patrol makes a bid for the White House.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: An idealistic young New York City public defender - burned out by the system, on the brink of disbarment, and seeing signs of the universe collapsing all around him - decides to rob a multi-million-dollar drug deal of one of his clients. Chased by Texas Rangers and Mexican federales, Jackson journeys across Mexico to seek forgiveness from the dead boy's father, only to fall in love with the land he was taught to hate. Action adventure, starring Jake Allyn and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Oscar-winning thriller starring Carey Mulligan. Haunted by a traumatic incident from her time at medical school, 30-year-old Cassie spends her evenings ensnaring predatory men in clubs and teaching them some harsh life lessons. When she discovers an opportunity to bring a man from her past to justice, Cassie gets to work enacting the ultimate revenge plot.

programme.title: Before I Go to Sleep
programme.desc: Mystery thriller starring Nicole Kidman and Colin Firth. Following a serious accident, Christine Lucas wakes up every morning with no memory of the life she has made with her husband Ben. But despite his patience and the help of a neurologist, Christine begins to question everything she is told about what happened to her.

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: Thriller starring Liam Neeson and Diane Kruger. While in Berlin for a biotechnology conference, scientist Dr Martin Harris is involved in a car accident that leaves him in a coma. He wakes up four days later with gaps in his memory and no identification. When he returns to his hotel, his wife Elizabeth says she's never met him before.

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: Mystery thriller directed by Martin Scorsese and starring Leonardo DiCaprio. In 1950s Boston, US marshal Teddy Daniels is called upon to investigate the disappearance of a female murderer from an institution for the criminally insane. But with the hospital's authorities being less than helpful, Teddy's work becomes hampered by false leads and misinformation.

programme.title: Red Lights
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller starring Robert De Niro, Sigourney Weaver and Cillian Murphy. Dr Margaret Matheson and her partner Tom Buckley are experts in debunking seemingly paranormal activity. When self-professed psychic Simon Silver returns to the public eye after many years absence, the pair are determined to expose him as a fraud once and for all.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman
programme.desc: Oscar-winning thriller starring Carey Mulligan. Haunted by a traumatic incident from her time at medical school, 30-year-old Cassie spends her evenings ensnaring predatory men in clubs and teaching them some harsh life lessons. When she discovers an opportunity to bring a man from her past to justice, Cassie gets to work enacting the ultimate revenge plot.

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: Thriller starring Liam Neeson and Diane Kruger. While in Berlin for a biotechnology conference, scientist Dr Martin Harris is involved in a car accident that leaves him in a coma. He wakes up four days later with gaps in his memory and no identification. When he returns to his hotel, his wife Elizabeth says she's never met him before.

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: Mystery thriller directed by Martin Scorsese and starring Leonardo DiCaprio. In 1950s Boston, US marshal Teddy Daniels is called upon to investigate the disappearance of a female murderer from an institution for the criminally insane. But with the hospital's authorities being less than helpful, Teddy's work becomes hampered by false leads and misinformation.

programme.title: Red Lights
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller starring Robert De Niro, Sigourney Weaver and Cillian Murphy. Dr Margaret Matheson and her partner Tom Buckley are experts in debunking seemingly paranormal activity. When self-professed psychic Simon Silver returns to the public eye after many years absence, the pair are determined to expose him as a fraud once and for all.

programme.title: Before I Go to Sleep
programme.desc: Mystery thriller starring Nicole Kidman and Colin Firth. Following a serious accident, Christine Lucas wakes up every morning with no memory of the life she has made with her husband Ben. But despite his patience and the help of a neurologist, Christine begins to question everything she is told about what happened to her.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal Agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve O'Reilly.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey Stein, an American working in Cologne for a drug dealer, falls for Juliette, a sick woman in need of a kidney transplant. Casey tries to get the cash Juliette needs for the operation by stealing from a crime lord. Co-writer and director Eran Creevy's action thriller, starring Nicholas Hoult, Felicity Jones, Ben Kingsley and Anthony Hopkins.

programme.title: The Hole
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Chris Massoglia and Haley Bennett. Susan Thompson and her sons Dane and Lucas move from New York to the countryside, where the brothers soon strike up a friendship with next-door neighbour Julie. But when they discover a bottomless pit in the basement, it's not long before their worst fears are manifested.

programme.title: MissionImpossible
programme.desc: Action spy thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Emmanuelle Béart. The elite Impossible Mission Force's latest assignment is to recover stolen information that threatens to blow the cover of US spies throughout the world. But the plan goes disastrously wrong.

programme.title: MissionImpossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of former colleague-gone-bad Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives.

programme.title: The Hole
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Chris Massoglia and Haley Bennett. Susan Thompson and her sons Dane and Lucas move from New York to the countryside, where the brothers soon strike up a friendship with next-door neighbour Julie. But when they discover a bottomless pit in the basement, it's not long before their worst fears are manifested.

programme.title: MissionImpossible

programme.title: MissionImpossible 2

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's controversial psychological drama starring Robert De Niro, Cybill Shepherd and Jodie Foster. Travis Bickle is an alienated ex-Marine, working nights as a New York cabbie. Haunted by the squalor of what he sees around him, he is drawn to the beautiful - and "pure" - Betsy. But his attempts to woo her prove to be disastrous, and he begins an inexorable descent into a personal hell, a descent that can only end in the bloodiest of climaxes.

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring William Petersen and Brian Cox. Ex-FBI investigator Will Graham is called in to solve a series of brutal murders by a killer dubbed the "Tooth Fairy". To help him in his search, Graham uses the extraordinary talents of Dr Hannibal Lecktor, a brilliant psychotherapist with a taste for human flesh.

programme.title: The Quarry
programme.desc: A drifter with no name kills David Martin, a travelling preacher, and takes his place at a small-town church, but the police chief, John Moore, suspects foul play and attempts to find out more. Director Scott Teems's drama, starring Shea Whigham, Michael Shannon and Bruno Bichir.

programme.title: Coyote Lake
programme.desc: Ester and her imposing mother Teresa run a bed-and-breakfast near the US/Mexico border. One evening, two unwanted guests arrive, threatening the safety of everyone. However, the women are hiding a secret. Co-writer/director Sara Seligman's thriller, starring Camila Mendes, Adriana Barraza and Charlie Weber.

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: Five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy, and live the life they have always wanted, is to steal from some of Chicago's richest people and give to themselves. Director Seth Savoy's crime drama, based on a true story and starring Michael Shannon, Patrick Schwarzenegger and Alex Pettyfer.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 32, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries between hangovers and bouts of self-pity. One day, a naive client brings him his first `adult" case, to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend. Comedy drama, starring Adam Brody.

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Rooney Mara, Jude Law, Channing Tatum and Catherine Zeta-Jones. Emily Taylor begins taking a new antidepressant in order to cope with her husband's release from prison. But the results of the treatment will have far-reaching consequences not only for Emily but also for the psychiatrist who prescribed it.

programme.title: No Sudden Move
programme.desc: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances, and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways. Steven Soderbergh's crime drama, starring Don Cheadle, Benicio Del Toro and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: Five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy, and live the life they have always wanted, is to steal from some of Chicago's richest people and give to themselves. Director Seth Savoy's crime drama, based on a true story and starring Michael Shannon, Patrick Schwarzenegger and Alex Pettyfer.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 32, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries between hangovers and bouts of self-pity. One day, a naive client brings him his first `adult" case, to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend. Comedy drama, starring Adam Brody.

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Rooney Mara, Jude Law, Channing Tatum and Catherine Zeta-Jones. Emily Taylor begins taking a new antidepressant in order to cope with her husband's release from prison. But the results of the treatment will have far-reaching consequences not only for Emily but also for the psychiatrist who prescribed it.

programme.title: No Sudden Move
programme.desc: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances, and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways. Steven Soderbergh's crime drama, starring Don Cheadle, Benicio Del Toro and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Tom Hardy and Emily Browning. The notorious Kray twins rule the East End underworld with iron fists. But while no outsider dare challenge their dominance, Reggie Kray suffers a personal battle when he is increasingly forced to choose between loyalty to his unpredictable brother Ron and his wife Frances.

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
programme.desc: Crime thriller based on a true story, starring Ricci Harnett and Craig Fairbrass. Over a period of 30 years, Carlton Leach progresses from football hooliganism to the leader of a feared criminal gang that terrorises London and Essex.

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: Tension rises to breaking point in a Cornish fishing village when the local citizens are crowded out by tourists. Writer-director Mark Jenkin's Bafta-winning drama, starring Edward Rowe, Simon Shepherd and Mary Woodvine.

programme.title: This Happy Breed
programme.desc: Drama directed by David Lean and based on the play by Noël Coward, starring Robert Newton, Celia Johnson and John Mills. Life between the two World Wars is viewed through the eyes of a south London family.

programme.title: Ministry of Fear
programme.desc: Spy drama starring Ray Milland and based on the novel by Graham Greene. To celebrate his release from a mental asylum, Stephen Neale visits a local carnival, where he inadvertently picks up a crucial microfilm meant for a Nazi agent. Realising that he may be in danger, Neale turns to a detective for help. But he soon finds himself accused of murder and on the run from both German spies and the police.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: Classic western, starring Gary Cooper and Grace Kelly. Marshal Will Kane's wedding celebrations are interrupted by the news that his archenemy is arriving on the noon train, seeking revenge.

programme.title: Cowboy
programme.desc: Western starring Glenn Ford and Jack Lemmon. Bored Chicago hotel clerk Frank Harris meets tough cattle rancher Tom Reece, and, dreaming of the "idyllic" life of the cowboy, joins Reece on a cattle drive bound for Mexico. But Harris's romantic illusions are soon shattered.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring Zachary Quinto and Chris Pine. Rebellious youth James Kirk is persuaded to join the Starfleet Academy, where he befriends Dr Leonard "Bones" McCoy and clashes with officer Spock. When an evil Romulan arrives from the future, the young crew of the USS Enterprise find themselves in the thick of the action.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Woody Harrelson and Jesse Eisenberg. Four mismatched people form a reluctant alliance in a world overrun by zombies and drive west, where they hope a Californian amusement park will be the ideal place to ride out the undead storm.

programme.title: Ready or Not
programme.desc: Grace Le Domas is a young bride whose wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game. Directors Matt Bettinelli-Olpin and Tyler Gillett's comedy horror, starring Samara Weaving, Adam Brody, Mark O'Brien, Henry Czerny and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Horror thriller starring Chris Hemsworth and Kristen Connolly. Five college friends take a short break at a forest retreat hoping for some hedonistic fun. But this is no ordinary property.

programme.title: Pledge
programme.desc: A group of misfit college freshmen, David, Ethan and Justin, attempt to achieve more credibility by pledging to an exclusive fraternity. However, they soon realise there's more at stake than they could have ever imagined thanks to an impromptu hazing session. Horror thriller, starring Zachery Byrd, Phillip Andre Botello and Zack Weiner.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Comedy sequel to The Pink Panther, starring Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer. The news that a chambermaid has been accused of shooting her lover is followed by even worse tidings: the incompetent Inspector Clouseau is on the case. Soon a trail of corpses marks the detective's disastrous course.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Animated adventure with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin and Hugh Jackman. When evil bogeyman Pitch sets out to destroy the innocence of children by taking away their sense of wonder, it falls to a crack team including Jack Frost, the Easter Bunny and Santa himself to protect the young people of the world.

programme.title: Men in BlackInternational Interview Special
programme.desc: The cast and crew discuss making the latest movie in the sci-fi action comedy franchise.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy starring Eddie Murphy. A group of tiny aliens comes to Earth in a spaceship designed to resemble a man. But attempting to navigate "Dave" around the streets of New York leaves the extraterrestrials baffled, until Dave is befriended by a woman and her young son.

programme.title: Nutty Professor 2the Klumps
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Eddie Murphy and Janet Jackson. Things are going well for Professor Sherman Klump: his new invention stands to make him a fortune and he is about to propose marriage to a beautiful colleague. But Sherman's smooth-talking alter ego, Buddy Love, is back on the scene and intent on ruining his plans.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Anna Kendrick and Rebel Wilson. Having graduated from college, the Bellas reunite for one last harmonised hurrah in the form of an overseas tour.

programme.title: Men in BlackInternational Interview Special
programme.desc: The cast and crew discuss making the latest movie in the sci-fi action comedy franchise.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Brad Pitt. Former UN employee Gerry Lane and his family find themselves in the middle of a zombie plague that is threatening to destroy the world. Gerry is soon persuaded to help what's left of the US government and embarks on a globe-trotting expedition to seek out a cure.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: Supernatural horror based on Stephen King's novel, starring Jason Clarke, Amy Seimetz and John Lithgow. Shortly after the Creed family move to a new town, their cat is killed in a traffic accident. Neighbour Jud suggests they lay the animal to rest in an ancient woodland burial ground. When the family is rocked by tragedy, though, events take a macabre turn.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller based on the novel by James Dashner, starring Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Will Poulter. In a post-apocalyptic world, a young man, confined in a community of teenage boys whose memories have been erased, plots his escape.

programme.title: Ferdinand (film)
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of John Cena and Kate McKinnon. Brawny but sensitive Mexican bull Ferdinand shies away from the violent sport where his father lost his life. However, when a misunderstanding leads his owners to believe he has become dangerous, Ferdinand is sent to a bullfighting ranch where he is selected to star in a high-profile - and possibly deadly - contest.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: Period drama adapted from EM Forster's novel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson and Helena Bonham Carter. Helen Schlegel, who lives in London with her sister Margaret and brother Tibby, is invited to stay at Howards End the country home of the affluent Wilcox family whom she has recently met. She falls in love with their younger son Paul, but it is the friendship that later develops between Margaret and the ailing Mrs Wilcox which has far-reaching consequences for both families.

programme.title: Star Trek VThe Final Frontier
programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure based on the popular TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. The captain and crew of the untested new starship Enterprise travel to the desolate world of Nimbus III after a Vulcan mystic kidnaps a group of Federation diplomats. There, they find themselves caught up in a dangerous quest.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman and Jeff Goldblum. The Earth faces its greatest challenge when alien spaceships take up positions above major cities. While world leaders speculate on the intentions of the visitors, cable-TV boffin David Levinson discovers that a signal emanating from the alien vessels is in fact a sinister countdown and the future of the human race hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie cop finds herself targeted by corrupt police and gangsters when she witnesses a drug dealer's murder. She teams up with the one person from her community who is willing to help her, as she tries to escape both the criminals out for revenge and the police who are desperate to destroy the incriminating evidence. Crime drama, starring Naomie Harris, Tyrese Gibson and Frank Grillo.

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Kate Winslet and Liam Hemsworth. A glamorous seamstress causes havoc when she returns to her home town in rural 1950s Australia, transforming its women and confronting those who wronged her.

programme.title: Drowning by Numbers
programme.desc: Cissie Colpitts drowns her husband after becoming sick of his philandering ways, and enlists the aid of local coroner Madgett to cover up her crime. However, when the spouses of Cissie's identically named daughter and granddaughter meet similar fates, the unfortunate Madgett is cajoled into hiding yet more murders. Black comedy, starring Joan Plowright, Juliet Stevenson, Joely Richardson and Bernard Hill.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men
programme.desc: Classic courtroom drama, director Sidney Lumet's feature film debut, starring Henry Fonda. A jury retires to an oppressive New York courtroom to reach a verdict on a teenager accused of killing his father. But their deliberations take longer than expected and tensions soon begin to boil over.

programme.title: Death Drums along the River
programme.desc: Crime mystery starring Richard Todd. While investigating a policeman's murder in Africa, Inspector Sanders comes across a diamond-smuggling racket.

programme.title: The Cockleshell Heroes
programme.desc: Second World War drama directed by and starring José Ferrer, and also starring Trevor Howard. Major Stringer heads a group of Royal Marines on a dangerous secret mission that involves planting mines on enemy ships moored in Bordeaux.

programme.title: The Desperados
programme.desc: Western starring Jack Palance and Vince Edwards. The ruthless Galt Gang, wanted for rape, robbery and murder across the west, head south for Texas, unaware that's where their peace-loving brother David has made his home. They bring with them a legacy of death and terror.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring Dane DeHaan and Cara Delevingne. Dark forces threaten Alpha City, home to a teeming mix of races and species. Intergalactic agents Valerian and Laureline investigate.

programme.title: Men in BlackInternational
programme.desc: The intergalactic law enforcers have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. This time they tackle their biggest threat - a mole in the Men in Black organisation. Director F Gary Gray's fantasy sequel, starring Chris Hemsworth, Tessa Thompson and Rebecca Ferguson.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Science-fiction action adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Edward Norton, Liv Tyler, William Hurt and Tim Roth. Army physicist Bruce Banner is exposed to gamma radiation during an experiment that turns him into an incredibly strong green giant in moments of emotional stress. He flees to Brazil in the hope of finding a cure, but ruthless general Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross is keen to exploit Banner's condition for the military and sends a soldier of fortune to apprehend him.

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: Drama starring Charlotte Rampling and Tom Courtenay. As the day approaches for Kate and Geoff to celebrate 45 years of idyllic married life, a troubling discovery from Geoff's past throws a cloud over preparations.

programme.title: Legend of the Lost
programme.desc: Adventure starring John Wayne, Sophia Loren and Rossano Brazzi. A mysterious stranger hires Joe January to guide him across the Sahara in search of a lost city - a mission made even more hazardous by the presence of a beautiful slave girl.

programme.title: The Black Tent
programme.desc: Second World War drama starring Anthony Steel and Donald Sinden. Assuming that his brother, a British officer, has been killed in Libya, Charles Holland journeys to North Africa and begins to investigate his sibling's mysterious story.

programme.title: Cowboy
programme.desc: Western starring Glenn Ford and Jack Lemmon. Bored Chicago hotel clerk Frank Harris meets tough cattle rancher Tom Reece, and, dreaming of the "idyllic" life of the cowboy, joins Reece on a cattle drive bound for Mexico. But Harris's romantic illusions are soon shattered.

programme.title: Tobruk
programme.desc: Second World War adventure starring Rock Hudson and George Peppard. An Allied force disguised as Nazis and PoWs sets out across the Libyan desert on a mission to blow up a fuel depot at Tobruk.

programme.title: Black Knight
programme.desc: Comedy starring Martin Lawrence. Jamal Walker is as an attendant at a medieval theme park, but after a bump on the head he wakes up in 14th-century England and joins the battle against an evil king.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: Psychological thriller based on a true story, starring Gerard Butler, Peter Mullan and Connor Swindells. In 1900, three men begin their shift working at the remote Flannan Isles lighthouse. When a stranger washes ashore following a storm, bringing with him a chest full of gold, the group argues over what to do with it, and their stay descends into paranoia and violence.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: All-star murder mystery starring Kenneth Branagh, Michelle Pfeiffer and Johnny Depp. En route from Istanbul to London, luxury train the Orient Express gets stuck in the snow and one of the passengers is found dead. Everyone on board falls under the suspicion of famed detective Hercule Poirot, but who is the culprit?

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Three middle-aged college friends reunite to commiserate over their failed marriages, each woman having been dumped by her husband for a younger 'trophy wife.' They decide to combine forces to pay their ex-husbands back.

programme.title: Heartburn
programme.desc: A marriage turns sour after a pregnant wife uncovers her husband's infidelities.

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: A family goes on a road trip to get their daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant.

programme.title: Little Miss Sunshine
programme.desc: A family goes on a road trip to get their daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: A bureaucratic technicality forces a European man to take up residence in JFK Airport.

programme.title: From
programme.desc: Boyd and Sara journey deeper into the forest than Boyd has ever gone, encountering new and terrifying mysteries. Jim's confidence in the radio tower begins to wane. An unexpected tragedy causes Donna to unravel. Kenny and Kristi share a moment.

programme.title: From
programme.desc: Boyd draws strength from an unlikely source. Jim's radio tower yields consequences which rock him to his very core. The hole that Tabitha has been digging leads her somewhere - and to someone - she could never have expected. Everything is about to change.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: It's 1871. 12-year-old Billy McCarty and his immigrant Irish family have to leave New York and travel west to seek new opportunities. But the journey proves fatal for some.

programme.title: Heartburn
programme.desc: A marriage turns sour after a pregnant wife uncovers her husband's infidelities.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Ten years after the tragic loss of her lead vocalist brother, a music manager meets a guitar prodigy who she believes is the reincarnation of her brother.

programme.title: You're Next
programme.desc: A family on a secluded getaway comes under attack by masked strangers.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder
programme.desc: A troubled Vietnam War veteran attempts to rid himself of haunting dreams and flashbacks.

programme.title: Saint Maud
programme.desc: Hospice nurse Maud, a newly devout Roman Catholic, becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of a former dancer in her care but sinister forces, and her own sinful past, threaten to put an end to her holy calling.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: After moving into a New York City apartment building, a young woman grows concerned over her new neighbours' eccentricities. When Rosemary finds herself pregnant, she soon suspects her neighbours may be a coven of witches with designs on her baby.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3
programme.desc: Two young sisters befriend an entity that lives in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4
programme.desc: Five years after the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, a new family moves to town stirring up strange happenings in the neighbourhood.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: With deadly creatures on their trail, the Abbott family ventures into the unknown.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou
programme.desc: A family starts to unravel when a series of unexpected visitors arrive at their isolated bayou house.

programme.title: The Deep House
programme.desc: A couple of amateur explorers discover a mysterious house submerged in deep waters.

programme.title: Graveyard Shift
programme.desc: A group of mill workers mysteriously disappear after they discover a horrifying secret in the factory's basement.

programme.title: Graveyard Shift
programme.desc: A group of mill workers mysteriously disappear after they discover a horrifying secret in the factory's basement.

programme.title: Thinner
programme.desc: An overweight lawyer accidentally kills a woman while driving. He gets away with it and is cursed by a gypsy woman on his way out of the courthouse. He starts to lose weight at a frightening rate and tries to find a way to stop the curse.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: It's 1871. 12-year-old Billy McCarty and his immigrant Irish family have to leave New York and travel west to seek new opportunities. But the journey proves fatal for some.

programme.title: The Party
programme.desc: Politician Janet and her intellectual husband Bill throw a small get together to celebrate her recent promotion, but things start to go off the rails shortly after the guests arrive when Bill makes a surprise announcement that shocks everyone.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck single mom flies home to spend Thanksgiving with her eccentric family.

programme.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
programme.desc: The adventures of Clifford, an enormous dog.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes attempts to solve a series of bizarre murders that appear to be suicides.

programme.title: A Quiet Place Part II
programme.desc: With deadly creatures on their trail, the Abbott family ventures into the unknown.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Dirk Pitt, who is searching for a lost Civil War battleship, and UN doctor Eva Rojas, who is investigating a deadly epidemic in Africa, race to prevent a ruthless dictator from causing an environmental catastrophe.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: When members of an evil cult kidnap a young Buddhist mystic in Tibet, only one man can save him.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: Seven years after a monster apocalypse, a young man embarks on a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja TurtlesOut of the Shadows
programme.desc: With April's help, the Turtles find out that The Shredder has returned and has hired a scientist to create mutants of his own. Adding to their troubles, New York City is invaded by an extraterrestrial army. The Turtles face their toughest fight yet.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In the future, the Capitol selects a boy and a girl from the twelve districts to fight to the death on television. Katniss volunteers to take her sister's place for the latest match.

programme.title: The Hunger GamesCatching Fire
programme.desc: After unwittingly starting a rebellion against the Capitol with their actions in the 74th Hunger Games, Katniss and Peeta have large targets on their backs.

programme.desc: The story comes to a close as Katniss and the unit from District 13 prepare to take down President Snow once and for all. With the nation in a full-scale war, Katniss will be tested as never before as she fights for the very future of Panem.

programme.desc: A small-town doctor discovers that aliens are taking over the bodies of townspeople.
